3668819Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int _outstandingRequests = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void InitObjectAsync()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    RequestField( proxy.GetDataForField1,Di2015NewLine                  proxy.GetDataForField1Completed, Di2015NewLine                  s => Field1 = s );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RequestField( proxy.GetDataForField2, Di2015NewLine                  proxy.GetDataForField2Completed,Di2015NewLine                  s => Field2 = s );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RequestField( proxy.GetDataForField3, Di2015NewLine                  proxy.GetDataForField3Completed,Di2015NewLine                  s => Field3 = s );Di2015NewLine    // ... and so on...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This method accepts two actions and a event handler reference.Di2015NewLine// It composes a lambda to perform the async field assignment and internallyDi2015NewLine// manages the count of outstanding requests. When the count drops to zero,Di2015NewLine// all async requests are finished, and it raises the completed event.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void RequestField<T>( Action fieldInitAction, Di2015NewLine                              EventHandler fieldInitCompleteEvent,Di2015NewLine                              Action<T> fieldSetter )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // maintain the outstanding request count...Di2015NewLine    _outstandingRequests += 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // setup event handler that responds to the field initialize complete        Di2015NewLine    fieldInitCompleteEvent += (s,e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fieldSetter( e.Result );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _outstandingRequests -= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // when all outstanding requests finish, raise the completed eventDi2015NewLine        if( _outstandingRequests == 0 )Di2015NewLine           RaiseInitCompleted();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // call the method that asynchronously retrieves the field value...Di2015NewLine    fieldInitAction();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void RaiseInitCompleted()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var initCompleted = InitObjectAsyncCompleted;Di2015NewLine    if( initCompleted != null )Di2015NewLine        initCompleted(this, null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3670089Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ScrambledEquals<T>(IEnumerable<T> list1, IEnumerable<T> list2) {Di2015NewLine  var cnt = new Dictionary<T, int>();Di2015NewLine  foreach (T s in list1) {Di2015NewLine    if (cnt.ContainsKey(s)) {Di2015NewLine      cnt[s]++;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      cnt.Add(s, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  foreach (T s in list2) {Di2015NewLine    if (cnt.ContainsKey(s)) {Di2015NewLine      cnt[s]--;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return cnt.Values.All(c => c == 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3671773Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DiffDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public readonly double d;Di2015NewLine    public readonly Lazy<Diff> df;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Diff(double d, Lazy<Diff> df)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.d = d;Di2015NewLine        this.df = df;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DiffClass : Floating<Diff>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DiffClass Instance = new DiffClass();Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Diff zero = new Diff(0.0, new Lazy<Diff>(() => DiffClass.zero));Di2015NewLine    private DiffClass() { }Di2015NewLine    public Diff Zero { get { return zero; } }Di2015NewLine    public Diff Add(Diff a, Diff b) { return new Diff(a.d + b.d, new Lazy<Diff>(() => Add(a.df.Value, b.df.Value))); }Di2015NewLine    public Diff Subtract(Diff a, Diff b) { return new Diff(a.d - b.d, new Lazy<Diff>(() => Subtract(a.df.Value, b.df.Value))); }Di2015NewLine    public Diff Multiply(Diff a, Diff b) { return new Diff(a.d * b.d, new Lazy<Diff>(() => Add(Multiply(a.df.Value, b), Multiply(b.df.Value, a)))); }Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3671773Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic T Price<M, T>(M m, T _maturity, T _frequency, T _coupon, T _nominal, T yield) where M : Floating<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T price;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    price = m.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (T index = m.Succ(m.Zero); m.Compare(index, m.Multiply(_maturity, _frequency)) <= 0; index = m.Succ(index))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        price = m.Add(price, m.Divide(m.Multiply(m.Divide(_coupon, _frequency), _nominal), m.Power(m.Add(m.Succ(m.Zero), m.Divide(yield, _frequency)), index)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    price = m.Add(price, m.Divide(_nominal, m.Power(m.Add(m.Succ(m.Zero), m.Divide(yield, _frequency)), m.Multiply(_maturity, _frequency))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return price;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3672558Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string MyStringProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo propertyInfo = typeof(MyClass).GetProperty("MyStringProperty");Di2015NewLine        Delegate getter = CreateGetter(propertyInfo);Di2015NewLine        Delegate setter = CreateSetter(propertyInfo);Di2015NewLine        object myClass = new MyClass();Di2015NewLine        setter.DynamicInvoke(myClass, "Hello");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(getter.DynamicInvoke(myClass));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Delegate CreateGetter(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var objParm = Expression.Parameter(property.DeclaringType, "o");Di2015NewLine        Type delegateType = typeof(Func<,>).MakeGenericType(property.DeclaringType, property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(delegateType, Expression.Property(objParm, property.Name), objParm);Di2015NewLine        return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Delegate CreateSetter(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var objParm = Expression.Parameter(property.DeclaringType, "o");Di2015NewLine        var valueParm = Expression.Parameter(property.PropertyType, "value");Di2015NewLine        Type delegateType = typeof(Action<,>).MakeGenericType(property.DeclaringType, property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(delegateType, Expression.Assign(Expression.Property(objParm, property.Name), valueParm), objParm, valueParm);Di2015NewLine        return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3672611Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <windows.h>Di2015NewLine#include <psapi.h>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include <iostream>Di2015NewLine#include <string>Di2015NewLine#include <map>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestd::string getfilename(DWORD pid) { Di2015NewLine    HANDLE process = OpenProcess(PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION | PROCESS_VM_READ, false, pid);Di2015NewLine    static int winver;Di2015NewLine    char path[256]= {0};Di2015NewLine    DWORD size = sizeof(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (winver==0) Di2015NewLine        winver = GetVersion() & 0xf; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if WINVER >= 0x600Di2015NewLine    if (winver >= 6)    Di2015NewLine        QueryFullProcessImageName(process, 0, path, &size);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine    if (!GetModuleFileNameEx(process, NULL, path, sizeof(path)))Di2015NewLine        strcpy(path, "Unknown");Di2015NewLine    return std::string(path);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetypedef std::map<DWORD, std::string> win_map;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace std { Di2015NewLine    ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, win_map::value_type const &v) { Di2015NewLine        return os << v.first << ": " << v.second;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBOOL CALLBACK show_info(HWND window, LPARAM lParam) {Di2015NewLine    win_map &exes = *(win_map *)lParam;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DWORD pid;Di2015NewLine    GetWindowThreadProcessId(window, &pid);Di2015NewLine    exes[pid] = getfilename(pid);Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint main() {Di2015NewLine    win_map exes;Di2015NewLine    EnumWindows(show_info, (LPARAM)&exes);Di2015NewLine    std::copy(exes.begin(), exes.end(), std::ostream_iterator<win_map::value_type>(std::cout, "\\n"));Di2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3677375Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ObjectViewModel : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ReadOnlyCollection<ObjectViewModel> _children;Di2015NewLine    readonly ObjectViewModel _parent;Di2015NewLine    readonly object _object;Di2015NewLine    readonly PropertyInfo _info;Di2015NewLine    readonly Type _type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool _isExpanded;Di2015NewLine    bool _isSelected;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ObjectViewModel(object obj)Di2015NewLine        : this(obj, null, null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ObjectViewModel(object obj, PropertyInfo info, ObjectViewModel parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _object = obj;Di2015NewLine        _info = info;Di2015NewLine        if (_object != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine            if (!IsPrintableType(_type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // load the _children object with an empty collection to allow the + expander to be shownDi2015NewLine                _children = new ReadOnlyCollection<ObjectViewModel>(new ObjectViewModel[] { new ObjectViewModel(null) });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _parent = parent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void LoadChildren()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_object != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // exclude value types and strings from listing child membersDi2015NewLine            if (!IsPrintableType(_type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // the public properties of this object are its childrenDi2015NewLine                var children = _type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                    .Where(p => !p.GetIndexParameters().Any()) // exclude indexed parameters for nowDi2015NewLine                    .Select(p => new ObjectViewModel(p.GetValue(_object, null), p, this))Di2015NewLine                    .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // if this is a collection type, add the contained items to the childrenDi2015NewLine                var collection = _object as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine                if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var item in collection)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        children.Add(new ObjectViewModel(item, null, this)); // todo: add something to view the index valueDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _children = new ReadOnlyCollection<ObjectViewModel>(children);Di2015NewLine                this.OnPropertyChanged("Children");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a value indicating if the object graph can display this type without enumerating its childrenDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    static bool IsPrintableType(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type != null && (Di2015NewLine            type.IsPrimitive ||Di2015NewLine            type.IsAssignableFrom(typeof(string)) ||Di2015NewLine            type.IsEnum);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ObjectViewModel ParentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _parent; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertyInfo InfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _info; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyCollection<ObjectViewModel> ChildrenDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _children; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string TypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var type = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            if (_object != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                type = string.Format("({0})", _type.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_info != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    type = string.Format("({0})", _info.PropertyType.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return type;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string NameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var name = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            if (_info != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                name = _info.Name;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var value = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            if (_object != null)Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = "<null>";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Presentation MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsExpandedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _isExpanded; {Di2015NewLine                _isSelected = value;Di2015NewLine                this.OnPropertyChanged("IsSelected");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool NameContains(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(text) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(Name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Name.IndexOf(text, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) > -1;Di2015NewLine 3678758Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid DoStuff(Foo foo) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dynamic d = foo;Di2015NewLine    DoStuffImpl(d);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3678758Di2015UniqueSeparatorDoStuffImpl

3680634Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string Get2Lines(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Degenerate case with only 1 wordDi2015NewLine        if (input.IndexOf(' ') == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return input;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int mid = input.Length / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int first_index_after = input.Substring(mid).IndexOf(' ') + mid;Di2015NewLine        int first_index_before = input.Substring(0, mid).LastIndexOf(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first_index_after - mid < mid - first_index_before)Di2015NewLine            return input.Insert(first_index_after, "<BR />");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return input.Insert(first_index_before, "<BR />");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3682433Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Converts the provided app-relative path into an absolute Url containing the Di2015NewLine/// full host nameDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="relativeUrl">App-Relative path</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Provided relativeUrl parameter as fully qualified Url</returns>Di2015NewLine/// <example>~/path/to/foo to http://www.web.com/path/to/foo</example>Di2015NewLinepublic static string ToAbsoluteUrl(this string relativeUrl) {Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(relativeUrl))Di2015NewLine        return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (HttpContext.Current == null)Di2015NewLine        return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (relativeUrl.StartsWith("/"))Di2015NewLine        relativeUrl = relativeUrl.Insert(0, "~");Di2015NewLine    if (!relativeUrl.StartsWith("~/"))Di2015NewLine        relativeUrl = relativeUrl.Insert(0, "~/");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var url = HttpContext.Current.Request.Url;Di2015NewLine    var port = url.Port != 80 ? (":" + url.Port) : String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return String.Format("{0}://{1}{2}{3}",Di2015NewLine        url.Scheme, url.Host, port, VirtualPathUtility.ToAbsolute(relativeUrl));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3682673Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string TimeAgo(this DateTime date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan timeSince = DateTime.Now.Subtract(date);Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalMilliseconds < 1) return "not yet"; Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalMinutes < 1) return "just now";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalMinutes < 2) return "1 minute ago";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalMinutes < 60) return string.Format("{0} minutes ago", timeSince.Minutes);Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalMinutes < 120) return "1 hour ago";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalHours < 24) return string.Format("{0} hours ago", timeSince.Hours);Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 2) return "yesterday";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 7) return string.Format("{0} days ago", timeSince.Days); Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 14) return "last week";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 21) return "2 weeks ago";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 28) return "3 weeks ago";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 60) return "last month";Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 365) return string.Format("{0} months ago", Math.Round(timeSince.TotalDays / 30));Di2015NewLine    if (timeSince.TotalDays < 730) return "last year"; //last but not least...Di2015NewLine    return string.Format("{0} years ago", Math.Round(timeSince.TotalDays / 365));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3683981Di2015UniqueSeparator// input dataDi2015NewLinechar[] data = { 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H' };Di2015NewLinechar[] xval = { 'U', 'V', 'W', 'X', 'Y', 'Z' };Di2015NewLineint[] idxs = { 5, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// algorithm starts hereDi2015NewLinevar output = new List<char>(data);Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < idxs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Insert the iâ€™th item in the right placeDi2015NewLine    output.Insert(idxs[i], xval[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Increment all the following indexes so that theyDi2015NewLine    // will insert in the right placeDi2015NewLine    for (int j = i + 1; j < idxs.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        if (idxs[j] >= idxs[i])Di2015NewLine            idxs[j]++;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// outputs V, W, X, A, Y, Z, B, C, D, E, U, F, G, HDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", output));Di2015NewLine

3684419Di2015UniqueSeparatorLaggedMethodPair
3684419Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction
3684419Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction
3684419Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class LaggedMethodPairDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private SynchronizationContext _context;Di2015NewLine    private Timer _timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Action _primaryAction;Di2015NewLine    private Action _laggedCallback;Di2015NewLine    private int _millisecondsLag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LaggedMethodPair(Action primaryAction,Di2015NewLine                            Action laggedCallback,Di2015NewLine                            int millisecondsLag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (millisecondsLag < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Lag cannot be negative.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do nothing by default.Di2015NewLine        _primaryAction = primaryAction ?? new Action(() => { });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do nothing by default.Di2015NewLine        _laggedCallback = laggedCallback ?? new Action(() => { });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _millisecondsLag = millisecondsLag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _timer = new Timer(state => RunTimer());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Invoke()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Technically there is a race condition here.Di2015NewLine        // It could be addressed, but in practice it willDi2015NewLine        // generally not matter as long as Invoke is alwaysDi2015NewLine        // being called from the same SynchronizationContext.Di2015NewLine        if (SynchronizationContext.Current == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(Di2015NewLine                new SynchronizationContext()Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _context = SynchronizationContext.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ResetTimer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _primaryAction();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void ResetTimer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _timer.Change(_millisecondsLag, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void RunTimer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _context.Post(state => _laggedCallback(), null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3686931Di2015UniqueSeparator    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, Pack = 1)]Di2015NewLine    internal struct TokPriv1LuidDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Count;Di2015NewLine        public long Luid;Di2015NewLine        public int Attr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", ExactSpelling = true)]Di2015NewLine    internal static extern IntPtr GetCurrentProcess();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("advapi32.dll", ExactSpelling = true, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    internal static extern bool OpenProcessToken(IntPtr h, int acc, ref IntPtr phtok);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("advapi32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    internal static extern bool LookupPrivilegeValue(string host, string name, ref long pluid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("advapi32.dll", ExactSpelling = true, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    internal static extern bool AdjustTokenPrivileges(IntPtr htok, bool disall,Di2015NewLine    ref TokPriv1Luid newst, int len, IntPtr prev, IntPtr relen);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll", ExactSpelling = true, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    internal static extern bool ExitWindowsEx(int flg, int rea);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const int SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED = 0x00000002;Di2015NewLine    public const int TOKEN_QUERY = 0x00000008;Di2015NewLine    public const int TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES = 0x00000020;Di2015NewLine    public const string SE_SHUTDOWN_NAME = "SeShutdownPrivilege";Di2015NewLine    public const int EWX_LOGOFF = 0x00000000;                               //Logoff flag   Di2015NewLine    public const int EWX_SHUTDOWN = 0x00000001;                         //ShutdownDi2015NewLine    public const int EWX_REBOOT = 0x00000002;                               //RebootDi2015NewLine    public const int EWX_FORCE = 0x00000004;                                //Force Logoff, shutdown or Reboot, add like this (EWX_REBOOT | EWX_FORCE)Di2015NewLine    public const int EWX_POWEROFF = 0x00000008;                         //Forced shutdownDi2015NewLine    public const int EWX_FORCEIFHUNG = 0x00000010;                      //Forced Logoff, shutdown or reboot if pc hangsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DoExitWin(int flg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool ok;Di2015NewLine        TokPriv1Luid tp;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hproc = GetCurrentProcess();Di2015NewLine        IntPtr htok = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        ok = OpenProcessToken(hproc, TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES | TOKEN_QUERY, ref htok);Di2015NewLine        tp.Count = 1;Di2015NewLine        tp.Luid = 0;Di2015NewLine        tp.Attr = SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED;Di2015NewLine        ok = LookupPrivilegeValue(null, SE_SHUTDOWN_NAME, ref tp.Luid);Di2015NewLine        ok = AdjustTokenPrivileges(htok, false, ref tp, 0, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        ok = ExitWindowsEx(flg, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

level : DWORD; var bufptr : PByte ) : DWORD; stdcall;Di2015NewLine  TNetApiBufferFree = function( Buffer : PByte ) : DWORD; stdcall;Di2015NewLine  USER_INFO_10 = recordDi2015NewLine    usri10_name : PWideChar;Di2015NewLine    usri10_comment : PWideChar;Di2015NewLine    usri10_usr_comment : PWideChar;Di2015NewLine    usri10_full_name : PWideChar;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLine  P_USER_INFO_10 = ^USER_INFO_10;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  _NetUserGetInfo : TNetUserGetInfo;Di2015NewLine  _NetApiBufferFree : TNetApiBufferFree;Di2015NewLine  ret : DWORD;Di2015NewLine  servername : string;Di2015NewLine  username : string;Di2015NewLine  level : Cardinal;Di2015NewLine  info : P_USER_INFO_10;Di2015NewLine  pbuf : PByte;Di2015NewLine  pwuser : PWideChar;Di2015NewLine  n : Integer;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  ret := 0;Di2015NewLine  _NetUserGetInfo := nil;Di2015NewLine  GetProcedureAddress( Pointer( @_NetUserGetInfo ), netapi32, 'NetUserGetInfo' ); // raises EProcErrorDi2015NewLine  if not Assigned( _NetUserGetInfo ) thenDi2015NewLine    Result := 'FunctionNotFound'Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  beginDi2015NewLine    // usernamesize := 200;Di2015NewLine    username := MyGetUserNameEx( 2 );Di2015NewLine    if username = '' thenDi2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine      Result := 'CanNotGetUserName';Di2015NewLine      Exit;Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine    n := Pos( '\\', username );      //' recover SO code formattingDi2015NewLine    if n > 0 thenDi2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine      servername := '\\\\' + Copy( username, 1, n - 1 );Di2015NewLine      username := Copy( username, n + 1, Length( username ) );Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine    level := 10;Di2015NewLine    pbuf := nil;Di2015NewLine    pwuser := PWideChar( username );Di2015NewLine    info := nil;Di2015NewLine    if servername = '' thenDi2015NewLine      ret := _NetUserGetInfo( { servername } nil, pwuser, level, pbuf )Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      ret := _NetUserGetInfo( PWideChar( servername ), pwuser, level, pbuf );Di2015NewLine    if ret = 0 thenDi2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine      info := P_USER_INFO_10( pbuf );Di2015NewLine      if Assigned( info ) thenDi2015NewLine        Result := info.usri10_full_name;Di2015NewLine      GetProcedureAddress( Pointer( @_NetApiBufferFree ), netapi32, 'NetApiBufferFree' );Di2015NewLine      if Assigned( info ) and Assigned( _NetApiBufferFree ) thenDi2015NewLine        _NetApiBufferFree( pbuf );Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine      if ret = 2221 thenDi2015NewLine        Result := 'Error_USER ' + usernameDi2015NewLine      else if ret = 1722 thenDi2015NewLine        Result := 'Error_RPC ' + servernameDi2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine        Result := 'E' + IntToStr( ret );Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

3687773Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IValueCollection> PivotValues(this MeasurementCollection items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(items.IsQuantized())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int elementLength = (int)items.First().Template.Frequency;Di2015NewLine        var itemArray = items.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        for (int n = 0; n < itemArray.Length; n++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IValueCollection v = new MeasurementValueCollection(elementLength);Di2015NewLine            for (int m = 0; m < elementLength; m++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                v[m] = itemArray[m].Values[n];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            yield return v;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        yield break; // Handle the case where IsQuantized() returns false...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3687773Di2015UniqueSeparatorMeasurementValueCollection
3687773Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<decimal>
3687773Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IValueCollection> PivotValues(this MeasurementCollection items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(items.IsQuantized())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var elements = Enumerable.Range(0, (int)items.First().Template.Frequency);Di2015NewLine        var itemArray = items.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var element in elements)Di2015NewLine            yield return new MeasurementValueCollection(Di2015NewLine                                 itemArray.Select( Di2015NewLine                                   (item,index) => itemArray[index].Value[element]Di2015NewLine                                 )Di2015NewLine                             );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        yield break; // Handle the case where IsQuantized() returns false...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3689750Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string PingHost(string host)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //string to hold our return messgeDi2015NewLine    string returnMessage = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //IPAddress instance for holding the returned hostDi2015NewLine    IPAddress address = GetIpFromHost(ref host);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //set the ping options, TTL 128Di2015NewLine    PingOptions pingOptions = new PingOptions(128, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create a new ping instanceDi2015NewLine    Ping ping = new Ping();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //32 byte buffer (create empty)Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[32];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //first make sure we actually have an internet connectionDi2015NewLine    if (HasConnection())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //here we will ping the host 4 times (standard)Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //send the ping 4 times to the host and record the returned data.Di2015NewLine                //The Send() method expects 4 items:Di2015NewLine                //1) The IPAddress we are pingingDi2015NewLine                //2) The timeout valueDi2015NewLine                //3) A buffer (our byte array)Di2015NewLine                //4) PingOptionsDi2015NewLine                PingReply pingReply = ping.Send(address, 1000, buffer, pingOptions);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //make sure we dont have a null replyDi2015NewLine                if (!(pingReply == null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    switch (pingReply.Status)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case IPStatus.Success:Di2015NewLine                            returnMessage = string.Format("Reply from {0}: bytes={1} time={2}ms TTL={3}", pingReply.Address, pingReply.Buffer.Length, pingReply.RoundtripTime, pingReply.Options.Ttl);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case IPStatus.TimedOut:Di2015NewLine                            returnMessage = "Connection has timed out...";Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        default:Di2015NewLine                            returnMessage = string.Format("Ping failed: {0}", pingReply.Status.ToString());Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    returnMessage = "Connection failed for an unknown reason...";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (PingException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnMessage = string.Format("Connection Error: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnMessage = string.Format("Connection Error: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        returnMessage = "No Internet connection found...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //return the messageDi2015NewLine    return returnMessage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3690844Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net.NetworkInformation;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static List<IPAddress> GetInternetIPAddressUsingSocket(string internetHostName, int port)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get remote host  IP. Will throw SocketExeption on invalid hostsDi2015NewLine            IPHostEntry remoteHostEntry = Dns.GetHostEntry(internetHostName);Di2015NewLine            IPEndPoint remoteEndpoint = new IPEndPoint(remoteHostEntry.AddressList[0], port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get all locals IPDi2015NewLine            IPHostEntry hostEntry = Dns.GetHostEntry(Dns.GetHostName());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var internetIPs = new List<IPAddress>();Di2015NewLine            // try to connect using each IP             Di2015NewLine            foreach (IPAddress ip in hostEntry.AddressList) {Di2015NewLine                IPEndPoint localEndpoint = new IPEndPoint(ip, 80);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool endpointIsOK = true;Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    using (Socket socket = new Socket(localEndpoint.Address.AddressFamily, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp)) {Di2015NewLine                        socket.Connect(remoteEndpoint);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception) {Di2015NewLine                    endpointIsOK = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (endpointIsOK) {Di2015NewLine                    internetIPs.Add(ip); // or you can return first IP that was found as single result.Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return internetIPs;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static HashSet <IPAddress> GetInternetIPAddress(string internetHostName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get remote IPsDi2015NewLine            IPHostEntry remoteMachineHostEntry = Dns.GetHostEntry(internetHostName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var internetIPs = new HashSet<IPAddress>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // connect and search for local IPDi2015NewLine            WebRequest request = HttpWebRequest.Create("http://" + internetHostName);Di2015NewLine            using (WebResponse response = request.GetResponse()) {Di2015NewLine                IPGlobalProperties properties = IPGlobalProperties.GetIPGlobalProperties();Di2015NewLine                TcpConnectionInformation[] connections = properties.GetActiveTcpConnections();Di2015NewLine                response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (TcpConnectionInformation t in connections) {Di2015NewLine                    if (t.State != TcpState.Established) {Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    bool isEndpointFound = false;Di2015NewLine                    foreach (IPAddress ip in remoteMachineHostEntry.AddressList) {Di2015NewLine                        if (ip.Equals(t.RemoteEndPoint.Address)) {Di2015NewLine                            isEndpointFound = true;Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (isEndpointFound) {Di2015NewLine                        internetIPs.Add(t.LocalEndPoint.Address);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return internetIPs;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine 3697264Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub Main()Di2015NewLine        Dim tab = <tabs>Di2015NewLine                      <tab>Di2015NewLine                          <name>Overview</name>Di2015NewLine                      </tab>Di2015NewLine                      <tab>Di2015NewLine                          <name>Testing</name>Di2015NewLine                      </tab>Di2015NewLine                      <tab>Di2015NewLine                          <name>Performance</name>Di2015NewLine                      </tab>Di2015NewLine                      <tab>Di2015NewLine                          <name>Braking</name>Di2015NewLine                      </tab>Di2015NewLine                  </tabs>Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(SwapElements("Testing", "Performance", tab).ToString)Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine()Di2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLine    Function SwapElements(ByVal firstElement As String, ByVal secondElement As String, ByVal tab As XElement) As XElementDi2015NewLine        Dim swapped = tab.Elements.Where(Function(e) e.Value = firstElement Or e.Value = secondElement).ReverseDi2015NewLine        Dim middle = tab.Elements.SelectMany(Function(e) e.ElementsAfterSelf.Where(Function(f) e.Value = firstElement).TakeWhile(Function(g) g.Value <> secondElement))Di2015NewLine        swapped.ElementAt(0).AddAfterSelf(middle)Di2015NewLine        Return <<%= tab.Name %>>Di2015NewLine                   <%= tab.Elements.Select(Function(e) e.ElementsBeforeSelf.Where(Function(f) e.Value = firstElement)) %>Di2015NewLine                   <%= swapped %>Di2015NewLine                   <%= tab.Elements.Select(Function(e) e.ElementsAfterSelf.Where(Function(f) e.Value = secondElement)) %>Di2015NewLine               </>Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine

3700187Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource FirstOrDefault<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (list.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return list[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return default(TSource);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3700187Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource FirstOrDefault<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("predicate");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (TSource local in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(local))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return local;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return default(TSource);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

'1' : '0';Di2015NewLine    x >>= 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Array.Reverse(bits, 0, i);Di2015NewLine  return new string(bits);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3703116Di2015UniqueSeparator    // assuming the assembly has only ONE classDi2015NewLine    // implementing the interface and method is void Di2015NewLine    private static void CallDoSomething(string assemblyPath, Type interfaceType, Di2015NewLine        string methodName, object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assembly assembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(assemblyPath);Di2015NewLine        Type t = assembly.GetTypes().Where(x=>x.GetInterfaces().Count(y=>y==interfaceType)>0).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        if (t == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("No type implements this interface");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo mi = t.GetMethods().Where(x => x.Name == methodName).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        if (mi == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("No such method");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        mi.Invoke(Activator.CreateInstance(t), parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3703456Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<T> Where<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<T> source, string columnName, string keyword)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arg = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine        Expression.Property(arg, columnName),Di2015NewLine        "Contains",Di2015NewLine        null,Di2015NewLine        Expression.Constant(keyword));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var predicate = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, arg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source.Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3703510Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type[] _types = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //load up a dll that you would like to introspect. In this exampleDi2015NewLine            //we are loading the currently executing assemble since all the sample codeDi2015NewLine            //is constained within this simple program.  In practice you may want to change Di2015NewLine            //this to a string that point to a particual assemble on your file system using Di2015NewLine            //Assembly.LoadFrom("some assembly")Di2015NewLine            Assembly a = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get an arrray of the types contained in the dllDi2015NewLine            _types = a.GetTypes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //loop through the type contained in the assembly looking for Di2015NewLine            //particuar types.Di2015NewLine            foreach (Type t in _types)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //see if this type does not contain the desired interfaecDi2015NewLine                //move to the next one.Di2015NewLine                if (t.GetInterface("CustomInterface") == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //get a reference to the attributeDi2015NewLine                object[] attributes = t.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(CustomAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine                CustomAttribute attribute = (CustomAttribute)attributes[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //do something with the attribue Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(attribute.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is a sample custom attribute class.  Add addtional properties as needed!Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class CustomAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private string _name = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CustomAttribute(string name)Di2015NewLine            : base()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _name = name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string NameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _name;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _name = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Here is a custom interface that we can search for while using reflection.  Di2015NewLine    ///  </summary>Di2015NewLine    public interface CustomInterfaceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        void CustomMethod();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Here is a sample class that implements our custom interface and custom attribute.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [CustomAttribute("Some string I would like to assiciate with this class")]Di2015NewLine    public class TestClass : CustomInterfaceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TestClass()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void CustomMethod()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //do some workDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Just another class without the interface or attribute so you can see how to just Di2015NewLine    /// target the class you would like by the interface.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class TestClass2Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TestClass2()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void CustomMethod()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //do some workDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

//can be changed at any time and will be adjusted when a job completed (or a new one is enqueued)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // enqueue as many persons as you likeDi2015NewLine        personQueue.Enqueue(new Person());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void OnHandlePerson(object source, PersonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //download persno here.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DownloadQueueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Queue<Person> _queue = new Queue<Person>();Di2015NewLine    int _runningThreads = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ThreadLimit { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Enqueue a new user.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="person"></param>Di2015NewLine    public void Enqueue(Person person)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_queue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _queue.Enqueue(person);Di2015NewLine            if (_runningThreads < ThreadLimit)Di2015NewLine                ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(DownloadUser);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Running using a ThreadPool thread.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="state"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void DownloadUser(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_queue)Di2015NewLine            ++_runningThreads;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Person person;Di2015NewLine            lock (_queue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_queue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    --_runningThreads;Di2015NewLine                    return; // nothing more in the queue. Lets exitDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                person = _queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            JobTriggered(this, new PersonEventArgs(person));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<PersonEventArgs> JobTriggered = delegate { };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PersonEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Person _person;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PersonEventArgs(Person person)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _person = person;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Person Person { get { return _person; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class PersonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Person(string fName, string lName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.firstName = fName;Di2015NewLine        this.lastName = lName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string firstName;Di2015NewLine    public string lastName;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3710817Di2015UniqueSeparatorFriend Shared Function InternalGetIsNetworkAvailable() As BooleanDi2015NewLine    If ComNetOS.IsWinNt ThenDi2015NewLine        Dim interface2 As NetworkInterfaceDi2015NewLine        For Each interface2 In SystemNetworkInterface.GetNetworkInterfacesDi2015NewLine            If (((interface2.OperationalStatus = OperationalStatus.Up) AndAlso (interface2.NetworkInterfaceType <> NetworkInterfaceType.Tunnel)) AndAlso (interface2.NetworkInterfaceType <> NetworkInterfaceType.Loopback)) ThenDi2015NewLine                Return TrueDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLine        Return FalseDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    Dim flags As UInt32 = 0Di2015NewLine    Return UnsafeWinINetNativeMethods.InternetGetConnectedState((flags), 0)Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Shared Sub ChangedAddress(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal eventArgs As EventArgs)Di2015NewLine    SyncLock AvailabilityChangeListener.syncObjectDi2015NewLine        Dim isNetworkAvailable As Boolean = SystemNetworkInterface.InternalGetIsNetworkAvailableDi2015NewLine        If (isNetworkAvailable <> AvailabilityChangeListener.isAvailable) ThenDi2015NewLine            AvailabilityChangeListener.isAvailable = isNetworkAvailableDi2015NewLine            Dim array As DictionaryEntry() = New DictionaryEntry(AvailabilityChangeListener.s_availabilityCallerArray.Count  - 1) {}Di2015NewLine            AvailabilityChangeListener.s_availabilityCallerArray.CopyTo(array, 0)Di2015NewLine            Dim i As IntegerDi2015NewLine            For i = 0 To array.Length - 1Di2015NewLine                Dim key As NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler = DirectCast(array(i).Key, NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler)Di2015NewLine                Dim context As ExecutionContext = DirectCast(array(i).Value, ExecutionContext)Di2015NewLine                If (context Is Nothing) ThenDi2015NewLine                    key.Invoke(Nothing, New NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs(AvailabilityChangeListener.isAvailable))Di2015NewLine                ElseDi2015NewLine                    ExecutionContext.Run(context.CreateCopy, AvailabilityChangeListener.s_RunHandlerCallback, key)Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            Next iDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End SyncLockDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

               MessageBox.Show("Access Granted. 3715146Di2015UniqueSeparatordelegate int D(int x);Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineclass CDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void M(int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int z = 123;Di2015NewLine        D d = x=>x+y+z;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(d(10));Di2015NewLine        z = 345;Di2015NewLine        y = 789;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(d(10));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3715146Di2015UniqueSeparatordelegate int D(int x);Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineclass CDi2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    private class LocalsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int y;Di2015NewLine        public int z;Di2015NewLine        public int A(int x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return x + this.y + this.z;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void M(int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Initialize the closure class:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Locals locals = new Locals();Di2015NewLine        locals.y = y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Transform the body so that all usages of y, z and the lambdaDi2015NewLine        // refer to the closure class:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        locals.z = 123;Di2015NewLine        D d = locals.A;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(d(10)); // Calls locals.A(10)Di2015NewLine        locals.z = 345;Di2015NewLine        locals.y = 789;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(d(10)); // Calls locals.A(10)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3720041Di2015UniqueSeparator    public unsafe static void UnsafeQuickSort(int[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fixed (int* pdata = data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UnsafeQuickSortRecursive(pdata, 0, data.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private unsafe static void UnsafeQuickSortRecursive(int* data, int left, int right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = left - 1;Di2015NewLine        int j = right;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int d = data[left];Di2015NewLine            do i++; while (data[i] < d);Di2015NewLine            do j--; while (data[j] > d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (i < j)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int tmp = data[i];Di2015NewLine                data[i] = data[j];Di2015NewLine                data[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (left < j) UnsafeQuickSortRecursive(data, left, j);Di2015NewLine                if (++j < right) UnsafeQuickSortRecursive(data, j, right);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3724340Di2015UniqueSeparator[WebService(Namespace = "http://tempuri.org/")]  Di2015NewLine[WebServiceBinding(ConformsTo = WsiProfiles.BasicProfile1_1)]  Di2015NewLine[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptService]  Di2015NewLinepublic class AutoComplete : WebService  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    public AutoComplete()  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [WebMethod]  Di2015NewLine    public string[] GetCompletionList(string prefixText, int count)  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        if (count == 0)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            count = 10;  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        if (prefixText.Equals("xyz"))  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            return new string[0];  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();  Di2015NewLine        List<string> items = new List<string>(count);  Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            char c1 = (char)random.Next(65, 90);  Di2015NewLine            char c2 = (char)random.Next(97, 122);  Di2015NewLine            char c3 = (char)random.Next(97, 122);  Di2015NewLine            items.Add(prefixText + c1 + c2 + c3);  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        return items.ToArray();  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

3724554Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static double TicksToOADate(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == 0L)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0.0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (value < 0xc92a69c000L)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value += 0x85103c0cb83c000L;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (value < 0x6efdddaec64000L)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new OverflowException(Environment.GetResourceString("Arg_OleAutDateInvalid"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        long num = (value - 0x85103c0cb83c000L) / 0x2710L;Di2015NewLine        if (num < 0L)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long num2 = num % 0x5265c00L;Di2015NewLine            if (num2 != 0L)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                num -= (0x5265c00L + num2) * 2L;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (((double)num) / 86400000.0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3729877Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BlockingStream : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly BlockingCollection<byte[]> _blocks;Di2015NewLine    private byte[] _currentBlock;Di2015NewLine    private int _currentBlockIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BlockingStream(int streamWriteCountCache)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _blocks = new BlockingCollection<byte[]>(streamWriteCountCache);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanTimeout { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanRead { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeek { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanWrite { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine    public override long Length { get { throw new NotSupportedException(); } }Di2015NewLine    public override void Flush() {}Di2015NewLine    public long TotalBytesWritten { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int WriteCount { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }Di2015NewLine        set { throw new NotSupportedException(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ValidateBufferArgs(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_currentBlock != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int copy = Math.Min(count - bytesRead, _currentBlock.Length - _currentBlockIndex);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(_currentBlock, _currentBlockIndex, buffer, offset + bytesRead, copy);Di2015NewLine                _currentBlockIndex += copy;Di2015NewLine                bytesRead += copy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_currentBlock.Length <= _currentBlockIndex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _currentBlock = null;Di2015NewLine                    _currentBlockIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (bytesRead == count)Di2015NewLine                    return bytesRead;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!_blocks.TryTake(out _currentBlock, Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine                return bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ValidateBufferArgs(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newBuf = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(buffer, offset, newBuf, 0, count);Di2015NewLine        _blocks.Add(newBuf);Di2015NewLine        TotalBytesWritten += count;Di2015NewLine        WriteCount++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Dispose(disposing);Di2015NewLine        if (disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _blocks.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Close()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CompleteWriting();Di2015NewLine        base.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void CompleteWriting()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _blocks.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ValidateBufferArgs(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("buffer");Di2015NewLine        if (offset < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("offset");Di2015NewLine        if (count < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");Di2015NewLine        if (buffer.Length - offset < count)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("buffer.Length - offset < count");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3730045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsComPlusApplicationRunning(string appName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int appDataSize = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(COMSVCSLib.appData));Di2015NewLine    Type appDataType = typeof(COMSVCSLib.appData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    uint appCount;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr appDataPtr = IntPtr.Zero; 3732341Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Assembly> assemblies = ...Di2015NewLineAssembly assemblyA = ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Since you say the only fact you wish to use about the class is that itDi2015NewLine// is named 'Customer' and it exists in Assembly A, this is just about the Di2015NewLine// only way to construct the Type object. 3734934Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object ConvertParameter(JsInstance parameter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (parameter.Class != JsFunction.TYPEOF && parameter.Class != JsArray.TYPEOF && parameter.Class != JsObject.TYPEOF)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return parameter.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (parameter == JsNull.Instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        JsFunction constructor = ((JsDictionaryObject)parameter)["constructor"] as JsFunction;Di2015NewLine        if (constructor == null) return parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (constructor.Name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "Date":Di2015NewLine                return JsDateConstructor.CreateDateTime(parameter.ToNumber());Di2015NewLine            case "String":Di2015NewLine            case "RegExp":Di2015NewLine            case "Number":Di2015NewLine                return parameter.Value;Di2015NewLine            case "Array":Di2015NewLine                object[] array = new object[((JsObject)parameter).Length];Di2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<string, JsInstance> key in (JsObject)parameter)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine                    if (int.TryParse(key.Key, out index))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        array[index] = ConvertParameters(key.Value)[0];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return array;Di2015NewLine            case "Object":Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (parameter.Class == JsFunction.TYPEOF) return parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dictionary<string, object> dic = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<string, JsInstance> key in (JsObject)parameter)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dic.Add(key.Key, ConvertParameter(key.Value));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return dic;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return parameter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3736177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InstanceRepositoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDictionary<Type, ICollection> _Instances = new Dictionary<Type, ICollection>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ICollection SomeTypeData(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ICollection instanceList;Di2015NewLine        if (!_Instances.TryGetValue(type, out instanceList))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this type does not exist in our dictionary, so let's create a new empty listDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // we could do this:Di2015NewLine            //instanceList = new List<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // but let's use reflection to make a more type-specific List<T> instance:Di2015NewLine            instanceList = (ICollection)Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(List<>).MakeGenericType(type));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // now add it to the dictionaryDi2015NewLine            _Instances.Add(type, instanceList);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Return the collection, for this type.Di2015NewLine        return instanceList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IList<T> SomeTypeData<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        ICollection instanceList;Di2015NewLine        if (!_Instances.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out instanceList))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            instanceList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            _Instances.Add(type, instanceList);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // here we are assuming that all of the lists in our dictionary implement IList<T>.Di2015NewLine        // This is a pretty safe assumption, since the dictionary is private and we know thatDi2015NewLine        // this class always creates List<T> objects to put into the dictionary.Di2015NewLine        return (IList<T>)instanceList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3736343Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NonCyclicCollectionResolver : ISubDependencyResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IKernel kernel;Di2015NewLine    private readonly bool    allowEmptyCollections;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NonCyclicCollectionResolver(Di2015NewLine        IKernel kernel,Di2015NewLine        bool    allowEmptyCollections = falseDi2015NewLine    ) {Di2015NewLine        this.kernel                = kernel;Di2015NewLine        this.allowEmptyCollections = allowEmptyCollections;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CanResolve(Di2015NewLine        CreationContext        context,Di2015NewLine        ISubDependencyResolver contextHandlerResolver,Di2015NewLine        ComponentModel         model,Di2015NewLine        DependencyModel        dependencyDi2015NewLine    ) {Di2015NewLine        if (dependency.TargetType == null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var itemType = dependency.TargetType.GetCompatibileArrayItemType();Di2015NewLine        if (itemType == null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!allowEmptyCollections)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetOtherHandlers(itemType, model.Name).Any();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Resolve(Di2015NewLine        CreationContext        context,Di2015NewLine        ISubDependencyResolver contextHandlerResolver,Di2015NewLine        ComponentModel         model,Di2015NewLine        DependencyModel        dependencyDi2015NewLine    ) {Di2015NewLine        var itemType = dependency.TargetType.GetCompatibileArrayItemType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var handlers = GetOtherHandlers(itemType, model.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var resolved = handlersDi2015NewLine            .Select(h => kernel.Resolve(h.ComponentModel.Name, itemType))Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var components = Array.CreateInstance(itemType, resolved.Length);Di2015NewLine        resolved.CopyTo(components, 0);Di2015NewLine        return components;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<IHandler> GetOtherHandlers(Di2015NewLine        Type   serviceType,Di2015NewLine        string thisComponentNameDi2015NewLine    ) {Di2015NewLine        return kernelDi2015NewLine            .GetHandlers(serviceType)Di2015NewLine            .Where(h => h.ComponentModel.Name != thisComponentName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3741495Di2015UniqueSeparatorTimeoutException
3741495Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Close()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (channel != null &&Di2015NewLine        channel.State == CommunicationState.Opened)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If cannot cleanly close down the app in 3 seconds,Di2015NewLine        // channel is locked due to channel heavily in useDi2015NewLine        // through callbacks or the like.Di2015NewLine        // Throw TimeoutExceptionDi2015NewLine        channel.Close(new TimeSpan(0, 0, 0, 3));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Dispose()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Dispose objectDi2015NewLine    if (channel != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Close existing connectionsDi2015NewLine            // *****************************Di2015NewLine            // This is the close operation where we perform Di2015NewLine            //the channel close and timeout check and catch the exception.Di2015NewLine            Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Attempt dispose objectDi2015NewLine            ((IDisposable)channel).Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (CommunicationException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (TimeoutException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3743927Di2015UniqueSeparatorendTile
3743927Di2015UniqueSeparatorAddFormationAlt
3743927Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static string left;Di2015NewLine    static string right;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int size = 20;Di2015NewLine        int sizem = size*2 + 1;Di2015NewLine        Map m = new Map(new int[sizem,sizem]);Di2015NewLine        AddFormationAlt(m, 1, size, size, size-1, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var l = left;Di2015NewLine        var r = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class MapDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int[,] Data { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Map(int[,] data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Data = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Print()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < Data.GetLength(0); x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int y = 0; y < Data.GetLength(1); y++)Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(Data[y, x] == 0 ? " " : Data[y,x] == 1 ? "." : "#");Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void AddFormationAlt(Map _map, int tile, int x, int y, int length, int endTile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // You may need to change the cloning method when you change the tiles from intsDi2015NewLine        Map m1 = new Map((int[,])_map.Data.Clone());Di2015NewLine        Map m2 = new Map((int[,])_map.Data.Clone());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Contains the left and right half of the Map you want, you need to join these together.Di2015NewLine        Map aleft = AddFormationAlt(m1, true, tile, x, y, length, endTile);Di2015NewLine        Map aright = AddFormationAlt(m2, false, tile, x, y + 1, length, endTile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        left = aleft.Print();Di2015NewLine        right = aright.Print();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Map AddFormationAlt(Map _map, bool up, int tile, int x, int y, int length, int endTile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x >= 0 && x < _map.Data.GetLength(0) && y >= 0 && y < _map.Data.GetLength(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_map.Data[y, x] != tile)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _map.Data[y, x] = tile;Di2015NewLine                    int newlength = length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Either go 'up' or 'down'Di2015NewLine                    if(up)Di2015NewLine                        AddFormationAlt(_map, true, tile, x, y - 1, newlength, endTile); // ^Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        AddFormationAlt(_map, false, tile, x, y + 1, newlength, endTile); // vDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    AddFormationAlt(_map, up, tile, x - 1, y, newlength, endTile); // <-Di2015NewLine                    AddFormationAlt(_map, up, tile, x + 1, y, newlength, endTile); // ->Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    _map.Data[y, x] = endTile;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _map;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3744923Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Match("$25/$2.05");Di2015NewLine        Match("$2.05/$2.05");Di2015NewLine        Match("$25.00/$22.05");Di2015NewLine        Match("$25/$10");Di2015NewLine        Match("x/$10");Di2015NewLine        Match("$10/x");Di2015NewLine        Match("$10$20");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex Pattern = new RegexDi2015NewLine        (@"^\\$(\\d+(?:\\.\\d{2})?)/\\$(\\d+(?:\\.\\d{2})?)$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Match(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Match match = Pattern.Match(text);Di2015NewLine        if (!match.Success) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0}: Match failed", text);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}: Matched! First: {1} Second: {2}",Di2015NewLine                          text, match.Groups[1], match.Groups[2]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
