3745670Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ParentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<Child> _children = new List<Child>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Parent()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    _children.Add(new Child());Di2015NewLine    _children.Add(new Child());Di2015NewLine    _children.Add(new Child());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add handler to the child eventDi2015NewLine    foreach (Child child in _children)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      child.TimerFired += Child_TimerFired;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Child_TimerFired(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // One of the child timers firedDi2015NewLine    // sender is a reference to the child that fired the eventDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ChildDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public event EventHandler TimerFired;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected void OnTimerFired(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {      Di2015NewLine    if (TimerFired != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      TimerFired(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // This is the event that is fired by your current timer mechanismDi2015NewLine  private void HandleTimerTick(...)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    OnTimerFired(EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3745703Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Handles client side caching by automatically refreshing content when switching logged in identityDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class ClientCacheByIdentityAttribute : ActionFilterAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the cache duraction in minutesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public int Duration { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Check for incoming conditional requestsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="filterContext"></param>Di2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (filterContext.IsChildAction || filterContext.HttpContext.Request.RequestType!="GET" || filterContext.Result!=null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string modifiedSinceString = filterContext.HttpContext.Request.Headers["If-Modified-Since"];Di2015NewLine        string noneMatchString = filterContext.HttpContext.Request.Headers["If-None-Match"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(modifiedSinceString) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(noneMatchString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime modifiedSince;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!DateTime.TryParse(modifiedSinceString, out modifiedSince))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (modifiedSince.AddMinutes(Duration) < DateTime.Now)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string etag = CreateETag(filterContext.HttpContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (etag == noneMatchString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            filterContext.HttpContext.Response.StatusCode = 304;Di2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new EmptyResult();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Handles setting the caching attributes required for conditional getsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="filterContext"></param>Di2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuted(ActionExecutedContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (filterContext.HttpContext.Request.RequestType == "GET" && filterContext.HttpContext.Response.StatusCode == 200 && !filterContext.IsChildAction && !filterContext.HttpContext.Response.IsRequestBeingRedirected)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            filterContext.HttpContext.Response.AddHeader("Last-Modified", DateTime.Now.ToString("r"));Di2015NewLine            filterContext.HttpContext.Response.AddHeader("ETag", CreateETag(filterContext.HttpContext));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Construct the ETagDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="context"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string CreateETag(HttpContextBase context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "\\"" + CalculateMD5Hash(context.Request.Url.PathAndQuery + "$" + context.User.Identity.Name) + "\\"";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Helper to make an MD5 hashDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="input"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string CalculateMD5Hash(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MD5 md5 = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine        byte[] inputBytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(input);Di2015NewLine        byte[] hash = md5.ComputeHash(inputBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < hash.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(hash[i].ToString("X2"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3746078Di2015UniqueSeparator    void ParseErrorDetails( DataServiceClientException e, out string errorCode, out int? commandIndex, out string errorMessage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GetErrorInformation(e.Message, out errorCode, out errorMessage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        commandIndex = null;Di2015NewLine        int indexOfSeparator = errorMessage.IndexOf(':');Di2015NewLine        if (indexOfSeparator > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int temp;Di2015NewLine            if (Int32.TryParse(errorMessage.Substring(0, indexOfSeparator), out temp))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                commandIndex = temp;Di2015NewLine                errorMessage = errorMessage.Substring(indexOfSeparator + 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void GetErrorInformation(  string xmlErrorMessage,  out string errorCode, out string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        message = null;Di2015NewLine        errorCode = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XName xnErrorCode = XName.Get("code", "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata");Di2015NewLine        XName xnMessage = XName.Get  ( "message",    "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (StringReader reader = new StringReader(xmlErrorMessage))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XDocument xDocument = null;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                xDocument = XDocument.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (XmlException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // The XML could not be parsed. This could happen either because the connection Di2015NewLine                // could not be made to the server, or if the response did not contain theDi2015NewLine                // error details (for example, if the response status code was neither a failureDi2015NewLine                // nor a success, but a 3XX code such as NotModified.Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            XElement errorCodeElement =   xDocument.Descendants(xnErrorCode).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (errorCodeElement == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            errorCode = errorCodeElement.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            XElement messageElement =   xDocument.Descendants(xnMessage).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (messageElement != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                message = messageElement.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3746601Di2015UniqueSeparator// a1 is line1 start, a2 is line1 end, b1 is line2 start, b2 is line2 endDi2015NewLinestatic bool Intersects(Vector2 a1, Vector2 a2, Vector2 b1, Vector2 b2, out Vector2 intersection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    intersection = Vector2.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector2 b = a2 - a1;Di2015NewLine    Vector2 d = b2 - b1;Di2015NewLine    float bDotDPerp = b.X * d.Y - b.Y * d.X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if b dot d == 0, it means the lines are parallel so have infinite intersection pointsDi2015NewLine    if (bDotDPerp == 0)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector2 c = b1 - a1;Di2015NewLine    float t = (c.X * d.Y - c.Y * d.X) / bDotDPerp;Di2015NewLine    if (t < 0 || t > 1)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float u = (c.X * b.Y - c.Y * b.X) / bDotDPerp;Di2015NewLine    if (u < 0 || u > 1)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    intersection = a1 + t * b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3746604Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void chkOrderDate_CheckedChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (chkOrderDate.Checked)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        qFlag |= QueryFlag.OrderDate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        qFlag &= (~QueryFlag.OrderDate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3746604Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<QueryFlag> GetFlags(QueryFlag flags)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (QueryFlag flag in Enum.GetValues(typeof(QueryFlag)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Presumably you don't want to include None.Di2015NewLine        if (flag == QueryFlag.None)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((flags & flag) == flag)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return flag;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3746604Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum
3746604Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FlagsHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This is not exactly perfect, as it allows you to call GetFlags on anyDi2015NewLine    // struct type, which will throw an exception at runtime if the type isn'tDi2015NewLine    // an enum.Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TEnum> GetFlags<TEnum>(this TEnum flags)Di2015NewLine        where TEnum : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Unfortunately this boxing/unboxing is the easiest wayDi2015NewLine        // to do this due to C#'s lack of a where T : enum constraintDi2015NewLine        // (there are ways around this, but they involve someDi2015NewLine        // frustrating code).Di2015NewLine        int flagsValue = (int)(object)flags;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (int flag in Enum.GetValues(typeof(TEnum)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((flagsValue & flag) == flag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Once again: an unfortunate boxing/unboxingDi2015NewLine                // due to the lack of a where T : enum constraint.Di2015NewLine                yield return (TEnum)(object)flag;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3746910Di2015UniqueSeparator    static byte[] VlqEncode(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uint uvalue = (uint)value;Di2015NewLine        if (uvalue < 128) return new byte[] { (byte)uvalue }; // simplest caseDi2015NewLine        // calculate length of buffer requiredDi2015NewLine        int len = 0;            Di2015NewLine        do {Di2015NewLine            len++;Di2015NewLine            uvalue >>= 7;Di2015NewLine        } while (uvalue != 0);Di2015NewLine        // encode (this is untested, following the VQL/Midi/protobuf confusion)Di2015NewLine        uvalue = (uint)value;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[len];Di2015NewLine        for (int offset = len - 1; offset >= 0; offset--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[offset] = (byte)(128 | (uvalue & 127)); // only the last 7 bitsDi2015NewLine            uvalue >>= 7;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        buffer[len - 1] &= 127;Di2015NewLine        return buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3750076Di2015UniqueSeparator==
3750076Di2015UniqueSeparator!=
3750076Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool operator ==(Ratio x, Ratio y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (x.b == 0 || y.b == 0)Di2015NewLine        return x.a == y.a;Di2015NewLine    // There is some debate on the most efficient / accurate way of doing the followingDi2015NewLine    // (see the comments), however you get the idea! :-)Di2015NewLine    return (x.a * y.b) == (x.b / y.a);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool operator !=(Ratio x, Ratio y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return !(x == y);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override string ToString()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return string.Format("{0}:{1}", this.a, this.b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3750709Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns all subsequences of the input <see cref="IEnumerable<T>"/>.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="source">The sequence of items to generateDi2015NewLine/// subsequences of.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A collection containing all subsequences of the inputDi2015NewLine/// <see cref="IEnumerable<T>"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Subsequences<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    // Ensure that the source IEnumerable is evaluated only onceDi2015NewLine    return subsequences(source.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> subsequences<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var comb in subsequences(source.Skip(1)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return comb;Di2015NewLine            yield return source.Take(1).Concat(comb);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3751135Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static long GetFileSizeOnDisk(string file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileInfo info = new FileInfo(file);Di2015NewLine        uint dummy, sectorsPerCluster, bytesPerSector;Di2015NewLine        int result = GetDiskFreeSpaceW(info.Directory.Root.FullName, out sectorsPerCluster, out bytesPerSector, out dummy, out dummy);Di2015NewLine        if (result == 0) throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine        uint clusterSize = sectorsPerCluster * bytesPerSector;Di2015NewLine        uint hosize;Di2015NewLine        uint losize = GetCompressedFileSizeW(file, out hosize);Di2015NewLine        long size;Di2015NewLine        size = (long)hosize << 32 | losize;Di2015NewLine        return ((size + clusterSize - 1) / clusterSize) * clusterSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern uint GetCompressedFileSizeW([In, MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)] string lpFileName,Di2015NewLine       [Out, MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)] out uint lpFileSizeHigh);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true, PreserveSig = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern int GetDiskFreeSpaceW([In, MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)] string lpRootPathName,Di2015NewLine       out uint lpSectorsPerCluster, out uint lpBytesPerSector, out uint lpNumberOfFreeClusters,Di2015NewLine       out uint lpTotalNumberOfClusters);Di2015NewLine

3755241Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rowElement"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cellIndex">0-based cell index.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public string GetCellData(XmlElement rowElement, int cellIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlNodeList cellElements = rowElement.SelectNodes("ss:Cell", xmlnsManager);Di2015NewLine        if (cellElements != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int elementIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (XmlElement cellElement in cellElements)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Special case: cells can be skipped. If so, there is a ss:Index attribute that contains the 1-based index of the cell.Di2015NewLine                if (cellElement.HasAttribute("ss:Index"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    elementIndex = Convert.ToInt32(cellElement.GetAttribute("ss:Index")) - 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If cell has been skipped.Di2015NewLine                if (cellIndex < elementIndex)Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (cellIndex == elementIndex)Di2015NewLine                    return cellElement.InnerText.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                elementIndex++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3755540Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<string> GetAllKeys( Dictionary<string,object> dictionary )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var stackDictionariesToVisit = new Stack<Dictionary<string,object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stackDictionariesToVisit.Push( dictionary );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // keep visiting iterating until the stack of dictionaries to visit is emptyDi2015NewLine    while( stackDictionariesToVisit.Count > 0 )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nextDictionary = stackDictionariesToVisit.Pop();Di2015NewLine        foreach( var keyValuePair in nextDictionary )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if( keyValuePair.Value is Dictionary<string,object> )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stackDictionariesToVisit.Push( Di2015NewLine                     keyValuePair.Value as Dictionary<string,object> );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return keyValuePair.Key;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3757264Di2015UniqueSeparatordef sort(a):Di2015NewLine  B = 101Di2015NewLine  count = [0] * BDi2015NewLine  for (k, v) in a:Di2015NewLine    count[k] += 1Di2015NewLine  for i in range(1, B):Di2015NewLine    count[i] += count[i-1]Di2015NewLine  b = [None] * len(a)Di2015NewLine  for i in range(len(a) - 1, -1, -1):Di2015NewLine    (k, v) = a[i]Di2015NewLine    count[k] -= 1Di2015NewLine    b[count[k]] = a[i]Di2015NewLine  return b    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine>>> print sort([(3,'b'),(2,'a'),(3,'l'),(1,'s'),(1,'t'),(3,'e')])Di2015NewLine[(1, 's'), (1, 't'), (2, 'a'), (3, 'b'), (3, 'l'), (3, 'e')]Di2015NewLine

3758286Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Vector2 RotateVector2(Vector2 point, float radians)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float cosRadians = (float)Math.Cos(radians);Di2015NewLine        float sinRadians = (float)Math.Sin(radians);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Vector2(Di2015NewLine            point.X * cosRadians - point.Y * sinRadians,Di2015NewLine            point.X * sinRadians + point.Y * cosRadians);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3758286Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Vector2 RotateVector2(Vector2 point, float radians, Vector2 pivot)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float cosRadians = (float)Math.Cos(radians);Di2015NewLine        float sinRadians = (float)Math.Sin(radians);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector2 translatedPoint = new Vector2();Di2015NewLine        translatedPoint.X = point.X - pivot.X;Di2015NewLine        translatedPoint.Y = point.Y - pivot.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector2 rotatedPoint = new Vector2();Di2015NewLine        rotatedPoint.X = translatedPoint.X * cosRadians - translatedPoint.Y * sinRadians + pivot.X;Di2015NewLine        rotatedPoint.Y = translatedPoint.X * sinRadians + translatedPoint.Y * cosRadians + pivot.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return rotatedPoint;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3758993Di2015UniqueSeparator POST http://maps.google.com/maps/feeds/maps/default/fullDi2015NewLineGData-Version: 2.0Di2015NewLineAuthorization: GoogleLogin auth="authorization_token"Di2015NewLineContent-Type: text/csvDi2015NewLineSlug: A new mapDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinename,latitude,longitude,descriptionDi2015NewLineHello,-77.066395,-11.968312,Greetings from Lima!Di2015NewLineThere,145.34502,-38.51512,Out There Down UnderDi2015NewLineHow,-88.421001,44.970465,How is Wisconsin?Di2015NewLineAre,13.084501,63.399164,Sorry about thatDi2015NewLineYou,140.637898,42.842568,I love you HokkaidoDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ClientLoginDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Client login url where we'll post login data to.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static string clientLoginUrl = Di2015NewLine            @"https://www.google.com/accounts/ClientLogin";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Data to be sent with the post request.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static string postData = Di2015NewLine            @"service={0}&continue=http://www.google.com/&Email={1}&Passwd={2}&source={3}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Get the Auth token you get after a successful login. Di2015NewLine        /// You'll need to reuse this token in the header of each new request you make.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="service"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="username"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="password"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="source"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static string GetAuthToken(Di2015NewLine            string service, string username, string password, string source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the response that needs to be parsed.Di2015NewLine            string response = PostRequest(service, username, password, source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get auth token.Di2015NewLine            string auth = ParseAuthToken(response);Di2015NewLine            return auth;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Parse the Auth token from the response.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="response"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private static string ParseAuthToken(string response)Di2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            // Get the auth token.Di2015NewLine            string auth = "";Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                auth = new Regex(@"Auth=(?<auth>\\S+)").Match(response).Result("${auth}");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new AuthTokenException(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Validate token.Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(auth))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new AuthTokenException("Missing or invalid 'Auth' token.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Use this token in the header of each new request.Di2015NewLine            return auth;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Create a post request with all the login data. This will return something like:Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// SID=AQAAAH1234Di2015NewLine        /// LSID=AQAAAH8AA5678Di2015NewLine        /// Auth=AQAAAIAAAAB910Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// And we need the Auth token for each subsequent request.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="service"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="email"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="password"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="source"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private static string PostRequest(Di2015NewLine            string service, string email, string password, string source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the current post data and encode.Di2015NewLine            ASCIIEncoding ascii = new ASCIIEncoding();Di2015NewLine            byte[] encodedPostData = ascii.GetBytes(Di2015NewLine                String.Format(postData, service, email, password, source));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Prepare request.Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(clientLoginUrl);Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine            request.ContentLength = encodedPostData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write login info to the request.Di2015NewLine            using (Stream newStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine                newStream.Write(encodedPostData, 0, encodedPostData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the response that will contain the Auth token.Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = null;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HttpWebResponse faultResponse = ex.Response as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine                if (faultResponse != null && faultResponse.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Forbidden)Di2015NewLine                    throw new IncorrectUsernameOrPasswordException(Di2015NewLine                        faultResponse.StatusCode, faultResponse.StatusDescription);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check for login failed.Di2015NewLine            if (response.StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine                throw new LoginFailedException(Di2015NewLine                    response.StatusCode, response.StatusDescription);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Read.Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine                return reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine string auth = ClientLogin.GetAuthToken("local", "username", "password", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUploadCSV(auth )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public  string UploadCSV(string auth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string URI = "http://maps.google.com/maps/feeds/maps/default/full";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest req = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(URI);Di2015NewLine            //Add these, as we're doing a POSTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            req.KeepAlive = false;Di2015NewLine            req.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            req.Headers.Add("GData-Version", "2.0");Di2015NewLine            req.Headers.Add("Slug", "A new map");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            req.Headers.Add("Authorization", "GoogleLogin auth=" + auth);Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream("E:\\\\Surajit\\\\MapPoint\\\\1.csv", FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLine            req.ContentLength = fs.Length;Di2015NewLine            req.ContentType = "text/csv";Di2015NewLine            Stream outputStream = req.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WriteInputStreamToRequest(fs, outputStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse resp = (HttpWebResponse)req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            outputStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            if (resp == null) return null;Di2015NewLine            StreamReader sr = new System.IO.StreamReader(resp.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine            return sr.ReadToEnd().Trim();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void WriteInputStreamToRequest(Stream input, Stream output)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BinaryWriter w = new BinaryWriter(output);Di2015NewLine            const int size = 4096;Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine            int numBytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((numBytes = input.Read(bytes, 0, size)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                w.Write(bytes, 0, numBytes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            w.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

3759238Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T>
3759238Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Splits the specified IEnumerable at every element that satisfies aDi2015NewLine/// specified predicate and returns a collection containing each sequenceDi2015NewLine/// of elements in between each pair of such elements. The elementsDi2015NewLine/// satisfying the predicate are not included.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="splitWhat">The collection to be split.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="splitWhere">A predicate that determines which elementsDi2015NewLine/// constitute the separators.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A collection containing the individual pieces taken from theDi2015NewLine/// original collection.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Split<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> splitWhat, Func<T, bool> splitWhere)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (splitWhat == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("splitWhat");Di2015NewLine    if (splitWhere == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("splitWhere");Di2015NewLine    return splitIterator(splitWhat, splitWhere);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> splitIterator<T>(Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<T> splitWhat, Func<T, bool> splitWhere)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int prevIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var index in splitWhatDi2015NewLine        .Select((elem, ind) => new { e = elem, i = ind })Di2015NewLine        .Where(x => splitWhere(x.e)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return splitWhat.Skip(prevIndex).Take(index.i - prevIndex);Di2015NewLine        prevIndex = index.i + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return splitWhat.Skip(prevIndex);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3761018Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToString(object source, Type type, Encoding encoding)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The string to hold the object contentDi2015NewLine    String content;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a memoryStream into which the data can be written and readedDi2015NewLine    using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the xml serializer, the serializer needs to know the typeDi2015NewLine        // of the object that will be serializedDi2015NewLine        var xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a XmlTextWriter to write the xml object source, we are goingDi2015NewLine        // to define the encoding in the constructorDi2015NewLine        using (var writer = new XmlTextWriter(stream, encoding))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Save the state of the object into the streamDi2015NewLine            xmlSerializer.Serialize(writer, source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Flush the streamDi2015NewLine            writer.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Read the stream into a stringDi2015NewLine            using (var reader = new StreamReader(stream, encoding))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Set the stream position to the beginDi2015NewLine                stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Read the stream into a stringDi2015NewLine                content = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the xml string with the object contentDi2015NewLine    return content;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3764144Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic TEnum GetEnum<TEnum>(string input) where TEnum : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!typeof(TEnum).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(typeof(TEnum).GetType() + " is not en enum");Di2015NewLine    Type dataType = Enum.GetUnderlyingType(typeof(typesectionEnum));Di2015NewLine    foreach (FieldInfo field inDi2015NewLine        typeof(typesectionEnum).GetFields(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.GetField |Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object value = field.GetValue(null);Di2015NewLine        foreach (DescriptionAttribute attrib in field.GetCustomAttributes(true).OfType<DescriptionAttribute>())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (attrib.Description == input)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (TEnum)value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return default(TEnum);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3764760Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class DataErrorInfo : IDataErrorInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string IDataErrorInfo.ErrorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return null; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string IDataErrorInfo.this[string columnName]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return ValidateProperty(columnName); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual string ValidateProperty(string columnName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         // get cached property accessorsDi2015NewLine            var propertyGetters = GetPropertyGetterLookups(GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyGetters.ContainsKey(columnName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // read value of given propertyDi2015NewLine                var value = propertyGetters[columnName](this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // run validationDi2015NewLine                var results = new List<ValidationResult>();Di2015NewLine                var vc = new ValidationContext(this, null, null) { MemberName = columnName };Di2015NewLine                Validator.TryValidateProperty(value, vc, results);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // transpose resultsDi2015NewLine                var errors = Array.ConvertAll(results.ToArray(), o => o.ErrorMessage);Di2015NewLine                return string.Join(Environment.NewLine, errors);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<string, object> PropertyLookupCache =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, Func<object, object>> GetPropertyGetterLookups(Type objType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = objType.FullName ?? "";Di2015NewLine        if (!PropertyLookupCache.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var o = objType.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine            .Where(p => GetValidations(p).Length != 0)Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(p => p.Name, CreatePropertyGetter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyLookupCache[key] = o;Di2015NewLine            return o;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (Dictionary<string, Func<object, object>>)PropertyLookupCache[key];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Func<object, object> CreatePropertyGetter(PropertyInfo propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var instanceParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object), "instance");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<object, object>>(Di2015NewLine            Expression.ConvertChecked(Di2015NewLine                Expression.MakeMemberAccess(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.ConvertChecked(instanceParameter, propertyInfo.DeclaringType),Di2015NewLine                    propertyInfo),Di2015NewLine                typeof(object)),Di2015NewLine            instanceParameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var compiledExpression = expression.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return compiledExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ValidationAttribute[] GetValidations(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (ValidationAttribute[])property.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ValidationAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3767071Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @SQL = COALESCE(@SQL + CHAR(10) + 'UNION ALL' + CHAR(10), '') Di2015NewLine    + 'SELECT ''' + REPLACE(QUOTENAME(t.Name), '''', '''''') + ''' AS TableName, COUNT(*) AS RowsMatched FROM ' + QUOTENAME(t.name) Di2015NewLine    + ' WHERE EntityId = DataClassId'Di2015NewLineFROM sys.tables tDi2015NewLineWHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.columns c WHERE c.object_id = t.object_id AND c.name='EntityId')Di2015NewLine    AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.columns c WHERE c.object_id = t.object_id AND c.name='DataClassId')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @SQL = 'SELECT x.TableName, x.RowsMatched FROM (' + @SQL + ') x WHERE x.RowsMatched > 0 ORDER BY x.TableName'Di2015NewLineEXECUTE(@SQL)Di2015NewLine

3768731Di2015UniqueSeparator public static string CleanUpXHTML(string xhtml)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int pOpen = 0, pClose = 0, pSlash = 0, pNext = 0, length = 0;Di2015NewLine                pOpen = xhtml.IndexOf("<p", 0);Di2015NewLine                pClose = xhtml.IndexOf(">", pOpen);Di2015NewLine                pSlash = xhtml.IndexOf("</p>", pClose);Di2015NewLine                pNext = xhtml.IndexOf("<p", pClose);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (pSlash > -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (pSlash < pNext)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (pSlash < pNext)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            pOpen = pNext;Di2015NewLine                            pClose = xhtml.IndexOf(">", pOpen);Di2015NewLine                            pSlash = xhtml.IndexOf("</p>", pClose);Di2015NewLine                            pNext = xhtml.IndexOf("<p", pClose);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        length = pClose - pOpen + 1;Di2015NewLine                        if (pNext < 0 && pSlash > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        xhtml = xhtml.Remove(pOpen, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        pOpen = pNext - length;Di2015NewLine                        pClose = xhtml.IndexOf(">", pOpen);Di2015NewLine                        pSlash = xhtml.IndexOf("</p>", pClose);Di2015NewLine                        pNext = xhtml.IndexOf("<p", pClose);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (pSlash < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int lastp = 0, lastclosep = 0, lastnextp = 0, length3 = 0, TpSlash =0 ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        lastp = xhtml.IndexOf("<p",pOpen-1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        lastclosep = xhtml.IndexOf(">", lastp);Di2015NewLine                        lastnextp = xhtml.IndexOf("<p", lastclosep);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        while (lastp >0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            length3 = lastclosep - lastp + 1;Di2015NewLine                            xhtml = xhtml.Remove(lastp, length3);Di2015NewLine                            if (lastnextp < 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            lastp = lastnextp-length3;Di2015NewLine                            lastclosep = xhtml.IndexOf(">", lastp);Di2015NewLine                            lastnextp = xhtml.IndexOf("<p", lastclosep);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return xhtml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

3769092Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MemoryStream CopyToMemory(Stream input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // It won't matter if we throw an exception during this method;Di2015NewLine    // we don't *really* need to dispose of the MemoryStream, and theDi2015NewLine    // caller should dispose of the input streamDi2015NewLine    MemoryStream ret = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[8192];Di2015NewLine    int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    while ((bytesRead = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Rewind ready for reading (typical scenario)Di2015NewLine    ret.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3769941Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetCommonStartingSubString(IList<string> strings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (strings.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine        if (strings.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine            return strings[0];Di2015NewLine        int charIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (IsCommonChar(strings, charIdx))Di2015NewLine            ++charIdx;Di2015NewLine        return strings[0].Substring(0, charIdx);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsCommonChar(IList<string> strings, int charIdx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(strings[0].Length <= charIdx)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        for (int strIdx = 1; strIdx < strings.Count; ++strIdx)Di2015NewLine            if (strings[strIdx].Length <= charIdx Di2015NewLine             || strings[strIdx][charIdx] != strings[0][charIdx])Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3771048Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string data = null;Di2015NewLine   bool help   = false;Di2015NewLine   int verbose = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   var p = new OptionSet () {Di2015NewLine      { "file=",     "The {FILE} to work on",             v => data = v },Di2015NewLine      { "v|verbose", "Prints out extra status messages",  v => { ++verbose } },Di2015NewLine      { "h|?|help",  "Show this message and exit",        v => help = v != null },Di2015NewLine   };Di2015NewLine   List<string> extra = p.Parse(args);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3771048Di2015UniqueSeparatorC:\\>program.exe /?Di2015NewLineUsage: program [OPTIONS]Di2015NewLineThis is a sample program.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineOptions:Di2015NewLine  -file, --file=FILE         The FILE to work onDi2015NewLine  -v, -verbose               Prints out extra status messagesDi2015NewLine  -h, -?, --help             Show this message and exitDi2015NewLine
3771078Di2015UniqueSeparator// This method first verifies that the source and destination have compatible types.Di2015NewLine// If they do not then an exception is thrown.Di2015NewLine// Otherwise, the name of each property is appended to the list, and eachDi2015NewLine// property of the destination is set to the index of its name on the list.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void GenerateFieldIndexes(Type sourceType, object destination, IList<string> names)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(sourceType != null);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(destination != null);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(names != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This throws an exception if the types are bad:Di2015NewLine    var destType = destination.GetType();Di2015NewLine    VerifyCommonPropertyNames(sourceType, destType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var sourceProp in sourceType.GetProperties()) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        var formattedName = sourceProp.Name.FormatName();Di2015NewLine        var destProp = GetProperty(destType, formattedName);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(destProp != null);Di2015NewLine        destProp.SetValue(destination, names.Count, null); Di2015NewLine        names.Add(formattedName); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Throw an exception if the two types do not have the right properties.Di2015NewLineprivate static void VerifyCommonPropertyNames(Type sourceType, Type destType) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(sourceType != null);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(destType != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We must have the same property names in both types, modulo case.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // (If you want to throw a different exception based on whether the missingDi2015NewLine   // property is in sourceType or destType, then use different set intersectionDi2015NewLine   // logic to figure out which case you're in.)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HashSet<string> names = sourceType.GetFormattedPropertyNames();Di2015NewLine    HashSet<string> badNames = destType.GetFormattedPropertyNames();Di2015NewLine    badNames.SymmetricExceptWith(names);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // badNames now contains all the names that were in sourceType but not destType,Di2015NewLine   // or in destType but not in sourceType.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (badNames.Any())Di2015NewLine       throw something based on badNames.First();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static HashSet<string> GetFormattedPropertyNames(this Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(type != null);Di2015NewLine    return new HashSet<string>(Di2015NewLine        from property in type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine        select property.Name.FormatName());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static PropertyInfo GetProperty(Type t, string propertyName) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(type != null);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(name != null);Di2015NewLine    return type.GetProperty(name, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.IgnoreCase); Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string FormatName(this string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(name != null);Di2015NewLine    return name.Trim().ToLower();Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

3774606Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object dummyNode = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public action.BeginInvoke(treeView1.Items, null, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RenderTreeView(ItemCollection root)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string       {Di2015NewLine                CreateAndAppendTreeViewItem(root, drive, drive, drive);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void FolderExpanded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = (TreeViewItem) sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (item.Items.Count == 1 && item.Items[0] == dummyNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            item.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine            var directory = item.Tag as string;Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(directory))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Action<TreeViewItem, string> action = ExpandTreeViewNode;Di2015NewLine            action.BeginInvoke(item, directory, null, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ExpandTreeViewNode(TreeViewItem item, string directory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string dir in Directory.GetDirectories(directory))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tempDirInfo = new DirectoryInfo(dir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool isSystem = ((tempDirInfo.Attributes & FileAttributes.System) == FileAttributes.System);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!isSystem)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CreateAndAppendTreeViewItem(item.Items, tempDirInfo.Name, dir, dir);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddChildNodeItem(ItemCollection collection, TreeViewItem subItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Dispatcher.CheckAccess())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            collection.Add(subItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.Invoke(new Action(() => AddChildNodeItem(collection, subItem)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CreateAndAppendTreeViewItem(ItemCollection items, string header, string tag, string toolTip)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Dispatcher.CheckAccess())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var subitem = CreateTreeViewItem(header, tag, toolTip);Di2015NewLine            AddChildNodeItem(items, subitem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine treeViewItem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3777562Di2015UniqueSeparator public static string TableFormat(string xhtml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int start = 0, end = 0, trstart = 0, trend = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (trstart != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //start=end;Di2015NewLine            trstart = xhtml.IndexOf("<tr>", end);Di2015NewLine            if (trstart == -1)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            trend = xhtml.IndexOf("</tr>", trstart);Di2015NewLine            start = xhtml.IndexOf("<td>", trstart);Di2015NewLine            end = xhtml.IndexOf("</td>", start);Di2015NewLine            while (end < trend)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //int trackTr = 0;Di2015NewLine                start = xhtml.IndexOf("<td>", end);Di2015NewLine                if (start > trend)Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                xhtml = xhtml.Insert(start + 3, " class=\\"right\\"");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                end = xhtml.IndexOf("</td>", start);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (xhtml);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3780825Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> TakeLast<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine        if (count < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count == 0) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var queue = new Queue<T>(count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var t in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (queue.Count == count) queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(t);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var t in queue)Di2015NewLine            yield return t;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3781184Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction<T>
3781184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Delegate Create<T>(EventInfo e, Action<T> a)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameters = e.EventHandlerType.GetMethod("Invoke").GetParameters().Select(p => Expression.Parameter(p.ParameterType, "p")).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var exp = Expression.Call(Expression.Constant(a), a.GetType().GetMethod("Invoke"), parameters);Di2015NewLine    var l = Expression.Lambda(exp, parameters);Di2015NewLine    return Delegate.CreateDelegate(e.EventHandlerType, l.Compile(), "Invoke", false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

any key to exit");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static TypeModel CreateProto()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var meta = TypeModel.Create();Di2015NewLine        meta.Add(typeof(Game), false).Add(Array.ConvertAll(typeof(Game).GetProperties(),prop=>prop.Name));Di2015NewLine        meta.Add(typeof(Player), false).Add(Array.ConvertAll(typeof(Player).GetProperties(),prop=>prop.Name));Di2015NewLine        return meta.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable, DataContract]Di2015NewLinepublic partial class GameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DataMember]Di2015NewLine    public bool Finished { get; 3794077Di2015UniqueSeparator% Note that I will store these in a cell array,Di2015NewLine% since I cannot preallocate the results.Di2015NewLineticDi2015NewLinexmax = 10000;Di2015NewLinexy = cell(1,xmax);Di2015NewLinefor x = 0:xmaxDi2015NewLine  % solve for y, given x. 3794229Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a delegate for our callback function.Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void SomeThreadTaskCompleted(string taskId, bool isError);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SomeClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DoBackgroundWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a ThreadTask object.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SomeThreadTask threadTask = new SomeThreadTask();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a task id.  Quick and dirty here to keep it simple.  Di2015NewLine        // Read about threading and task identifiers to learn Di2015NewLine        // various ways people commonly do this for production code.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        threadTask.TaskId = "MyTask" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the thread up with a callback function pointer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        threadTask.CompletedCallback = Di2015NewLine            new SomeThreadTaskCompleted(SomeThreadTaskCompletedCallback);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a thread.  We only need to specify the entry point function.Di2015NewLine        // Framework creates the actual delegate for thread with this entry point.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread(threadTask.ExecuteThreadTask);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do something with our thread and threadTask object instances just createdDi2015NewLine        // so we could cancel the thread etc.  Can be as simple as stick 'em in a bagDi2015NewLine        // or may need a complex manager, just depends.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // GO!Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Go do something else.  When task finishes we will get a callback.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Method that receives callbacks from threads upon completion.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="taskId"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="isError"></param>Di2015NewLine    public void SomeThreadTaskCompletedCallback(string taskId, bool isError)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do post background work here.Di2015NewLine        // Cleanup the thread and task object references, etc.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// ThreadTask defines the work a thread needs to do and also provides any data Di2015NewLine/// required along with callback pointers etc.Di2015NewLine/// Populate a new ThreadTask instance with any data the thread needs Di2015NewLine/// then start the thread to execute the task.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineinternal class SomeThreadTaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string _taskId;Di2015NewLine    private SomeThreadTaskCompleted _completedCallback;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get. Set simple identifier that allows main thread to identify this task.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal string TaskIdDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _taskId; }Di2015NewLine        set { _taskId = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get, Set instance of a delegate used to notify the main thread when done.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal SomeThreadTaskCompleted CompletedCallbackDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _completedCallback; }Di2015NewLine        set { _completedCallback = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Thread entry point function.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    internal void ExecuteThreadTask()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Often a good idea to tell the main thread if there was an errorDi2015NewLine        bool isError = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Thread begins execution here.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // You would start some kind of long task here Di2015NewLine        // such as image processing, file parsing, complex query, etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Thread execution eventually returns to this function when complete.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Execute callback to tell main thread this task is done.Di2015NewLine        _completedCallback.Invoke(_taskId, isError);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3799444Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass RandomDictionary<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<TKey, TValue[]> m_dict;Di2015NewLine    Random m_random;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RandomDictionary()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_dict = new Dictionary<TKey, TValue[]>();Di2015NewLine        m_random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TValue this[TKey key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TValue[] values = m_dict[key];Di2015NewLine            return values[m_random.Next(0, values.Length)];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Define(TKey key, params TValue[] values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_dict[key] = new TValue[values.Length];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(values, m_dict[key], values.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryGetValue(TKey key, out TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TValue[] values;Di2015NewLine        if (!m_dict.TryGetValue(key, out values))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = default(TValue);Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        value = values[m_random.Next(0, values.Length)];Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3800495Di2015UniqueSeparator    static List<string> SplitByComma(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool quoted = false;Di2015NewLine        bool attr = false;Di2015NewLine        int start = 0;Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < str.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch(str[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case '[':Di2015NewLine                    if(!quoted) attr = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ']':Di2015NewLine                    if(!quoted) attr = false;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case '\\"':Di2015NewLine                    if(!attr) quoted = !quoted;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ',':Di2015NewLine                    if(!quoted && !attr)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result.Add(str.Substring(start, i - start));Di2015NewLine                        start = i + 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(start < str.Length)Di2015NewLine            result.Add(str.Substring(start));Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3800653Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Graph{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //matrix[i,j] is true if there is a node from i to jDi2015NewLine    bool[,] matrix;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void BFS( int startNode )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = matrix.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        bool [] marks = new bool[n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Queue<int> nodes = new Queue();Di2015NewLine        nodes.Enqueue(startNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ( !nodes.Empty() )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int node = nodes.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set visitedDi2015NewLine            marks[node] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<int> adjs = GetAdyacents(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach ( int adjacent in adjs ){Di2015NewLine                if ( !mark[adjacent] )Di2015NewLine                    nodes.Enqueue(adjacent);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Visiting {0}", node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3800905Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Performs a breadth-first traversal of a control's control tree. UnlikeDi2015NewLine/// FindControl, this method does not descend into controls that have notDi2015NewLine/// called EnsureChildControls yet.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Enumerable of the visited controls.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Control> GetControlDescendants(this Control parent) {Di2015NewLine    // Don't force execution of EnsureChildControlsDi2015NewLine    if (!parent.HasControls()) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Control child in parent.Controls) {Di2015NewLine        yield return child;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control child in parent.Controls) {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var descendant in child.GetControlDescendants()) {Di2015NewLine            yield return descendant;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3802143Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ContainsExactlyOneItem<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check we've got at least one itemDi2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Check we've got no moreDi2015NewLine        return !iterator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3802143Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool CountEquals<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (count < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count",Di2015NewLine                                              "count must not be negative");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // We don't rely on the optimizations in LINQ to Objects here, asDi2015NewLine    // they have changed between versions.Di2015NewLine    ICollection<T> genericCollection = source as ICollection<T>;Di2015NewLine    if (genericCollection != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return genericCollection.Count == count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ICollection nonGenericCollection = source as ICollection;Di2015NewLine    if (nonGenericCollection != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return nonGenericCollection.Count == count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Okay, we're finally ready to do the actual work...Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Check we've got no moreDi2015NewLine        return !iterator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3802143Di2015UniqueSeparatorCountEquals
3802143Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool CountEquals<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (count < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count", Di2015NewLine                                              "count must not be negative");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IteratorCountEquals(iterator, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IteratorCountEquals<T>(IEnumerator<T> iterator, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return count == 0 ? !iterator.MoveNext()Di2015NewLine        : iterator.MoveNext() && IteratorCountEquals(iterator, count - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3805506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Eric Lippert's Cartesian Product operator...Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(Di2015NewLine          this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = Di2015NewLine                   new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() };Di2015NewLine        return sequences.Aggregate(Di2015NewLine          emptyProduct,Di2015NewLine          (accumulator, sequence) =>Di2015NewLine            from accseq in accumulatorDi2015NewLine            from item in sequenceDi2015NewLine            select accseq.Concat(new[] { item }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MDFillDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create an arbitrary multidimensional arrayDi2015NewLine        Array mdArray = new int[2,3,4,5];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a sequences of sequences representing all of the possibleDi2015NewLine        // index positions of each dimension within the MD-arrayDi2015NewLine        var dimensionBounds = Di2015NewLine            Enumerable.Range(0, mdArray.Rank)Di2015NewLine               .Select(x => Enumerable.Range(mdArray.GetLowerBound(x),Di2015NewLine                      mdArray.GetUpperBound(x) - mdArray.GetLowerBound(x)+1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use the cartesian product to visit every permutation of indexesDi2015NewLine        // in the MD array and set each position to a specific value...Di2015NewLine        int someValue = 100;Di2015NewLine        foreach( var indexSet in dimensionBounds.CartesianProduct() )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mdArray.SetValue( someValue, indexSet.ToArray() );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3806145Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex r = new Regex("^([0-9]+([ ,]|, )[0-9]+(\\\\2)[0-9]+)( [/] ([0-9]+(\\\\2)[0-9]+(\\\\2)[0-9]+)+)*$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar x1 = r.IsMatch("1,2 3");         // falseDi2015NewLinevar x2 = r.IsMatch("1 3 2 / 1 2 3"); // trueDi2015NewLinevar x3 = r.IsMatch("1,3,2");         // trueDi2015NewLinevar x4 = r.IsMatch("1 3 2 / 1");     // falseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine((x1 == false) ? "Correct" : "Error");Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine((x2 == true) ? "Correct" : "Error");Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine((x3 == true) ? 3807049Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid ComputeDenseOpticalFlow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compute dense optical flow using Horn and Schunk algoDi2015NewLine        velx = new Image<Gray, float>(faceGrayImage.Size);Di2015NewLine        vely = new Image<Gray, float>(faceNextGrayImage.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OpticalFlow.HS(faceGrayImage, faceNextGrayImage, true, velx, vely, 0.1d, new MCvTermCriteria(100));            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Dense Optical Flow DrawingDi2015NewLine        Size winSize = new Size(10, 10);Di2015NewLine        vectorFieldX = (int)Math.Round((double)faceGrayImage.Width / winSize.Width);Di2015NewLine        vectorFieldY = (int)Math.Round((double)faceGrayImage.Height / winSize.Height);Di2015NewLine        sumVectorFieldX = 0f;Di2015NewLine        sumVectorFieldY = 0f;Di2015NewLine        vectorField = new PointF[vectorFieldX][];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < vectorFieldX; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            vectorField[i] = new PointF[vectorFieldY];Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < vectorFieldY; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Gray velx_gray = velx[j * winSize.Width, i * winSize.Width];Di2015NewLine                float velx_float = (float)velx_gray.Intensity;Di2015NewLine                Gray vely_gray = vely[j * winSize.Height, i * winSize.Height];Di2015NewLine                float vely_float = (float)vely_gray.Intensity;Di2015NewLine                sumVectorFieldX += velx_float;Di2015NewLine                sumVectorFieldY += vely_float;Di2015NewLine                vectorField[i][j] = new PointF(velx_float, vely_float);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Cross2DF cr = new Cross2DF(Di2015NewLine                    new PointF((i*winSize.Width) +trackingArea.X,Di2015NewLine                               (j*winSize.Height)+trackingArea.Y),Di2015NewLine                               1, 1);Di2015NewLine                opticalFlowFrame.Draw(cr, new Bgr(Color.Red), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                LineSegment2D ci = new LineSegment2D(Di2015NewLine                    new Point((i*winSize.Width)+trackingArea.X,Di2015NewLine                              (j * winSize.Height)+trackingArea.Y), Di2015NewLine                    new Point((int)((i * winSize.Width)  + trackingArea.X + velx_float),Di2015NewLine                              (int)((j * winSize.Height) + trackingArea.Y + vely_float)));Di2015NewLine                opticalFlowFrame.Draw(ci, new Bgr(Color.Yellow), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3809854Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Image RotateImage(Image img, float rotationAngle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // When drawing the returned image to a form, modify your points by Di2015NewLine        // (-(img.Width / 2) - 1, -(img.Height / 2) - 1) to draw for actual co-ordinates.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create an empty Bitmap image Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap((img.Width * 2), (img.Height *2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //turn the Bitmap into a Graphics objectDi2015NewLine        Graphics gfx = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //set the point system origin to the center of our imageDi2015NewLine        gfx.TranslateTransform((float)bmp.Width / 2, (float)bmp.Height / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //now rotate the imageDi2015NewLine        gfx.RotateTransform(rotationAngle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //move the point system origin back to 0,0Di2015NewLine        gfx.TranslateTransform(-(float)bmp.Width / 2, -(float)bmp.Height / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //set the InterpolationMode to HighQualityBicubic so to ensure a highDi2015NewLine        //quality image once it is transformed to the specified sizeDi2015NewLine        gfx.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //draw our new image onto the graphics object with its center on the center of rotationDi2015NewLine        gfx.DrawImage(img, new PointF((img.Width / 2), (img.Height / 2)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //dispose of our Graphics objectDi2015NewLine        gfx.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //return the imageDi2015NewLine        return bmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3815216Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RazorViewEngineRender {Di2015NewLine    internal static Dictionary<string, string> strings { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string guid;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static RazorViewEngineRender() {Di2015NewLine        strings = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RazorViewEngineRender(string Template) {Di2015NewLine        guid = Guid.NewGuid().ToString() + ".cshtml";Di2015NewLine        strings.Add(guid, Template);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Render() {Di2015NewLine        return Render(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Render(object ViewModel) {Di2015NewLine        //Register model typeDi2015NewLine        if (ViewModel == null) {Di2015NewLine            strings[guid] = "@inherits System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage\\r\\n" + strings[guid];Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            strings[guid] = "@inherits System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage<" + ViewModel.GetType().FullName + ">\\r\\n" + strings[guid];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CshtmlView view = new CshtmlView("/stringviews/" + guid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Text.StringBuilder sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        System.IO.TextWriter tw = new System.IO.StringWriter(sb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ControllerContext controller = new ControllerContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ViewDataDictionary ViewData = new ViewDataDictionary();Di2015NewLine        ViewData.Model = ViewModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        view.Render(new ViewContext(controller, view, ViewData, new TempDataDictionary(), tw), tw);Di2015NewLine        //view.ExecutePageHierarchy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        strings.Remove(guid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
