3823368Di2015UniqueSeparator   <!-- Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    URL of user web application that can be used to clear caches.  Di2015NewLine    Delimit multiple URLS with pipes: url1|url2|url3 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    -->Di2015NewLine    <add key="UserServers" value="http://123.456.789.001/|http://123.456.789.002" />Di2015NewLine
3823368Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Calls for a reset of caches on one or more user sites serving reports. Di2015NewLine        /// Allows for multiple urls to be processed; configure the reset targetsDi2015NewLine        /// using AppSettings["UserCacheResetUrl"], delimited with pipes if thereDi2015NewLine        /// are multiple sites. Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void ClearAllUserCaches()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // clear local user cachesDi2015NewLine            ClearUserCaches();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // clear out of process user cachesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string[] urls = AppSettings.UserServers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for( int i = 0; i < urls.Length; i++ )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string url = urls[i] + AppSettings.UserCacheResetPath + "&sharedPassword=" + AppSettings.SharedPassword;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                WebRequest request = null;Di2015NewLine                HttpWebResponse response = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    request = WebRequest.Create( url );Di2015NewLine                    response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch( WebException ex )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Log.LogException( ex );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    request = null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if( response == null || response.StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if( response != null )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        response.Close();Di2015NewLine                        response = null;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
3823368Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Exposes an interface for trusted callers to request that thisDi2015NewLine    /// instance of the application perform an action.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class AdministrationRequestHandler : IHttpHandlerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Processes an incoming request and performs an action specified via the "action"Di2015NewLine        /// parameter passed on the query string.  Only local callers will be allowed, andDi2015NewLine        /// only callers who pass a shared password via the "sharedPassword" query stringDi2015NewLine        /// parameter.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="context"></param>Di2015NewLine        public void ProcessRequest( HttpContext context )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // get the action from the query string, and check thatDi2015NewLine            // it actually contains a value.Di2015NewLine            string action = context.Request.QueryString["action"].ToSafeString().ToUpper( CultureInfo.InvariantCulture );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( string.IsNullOrEmpty( action ) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Di2015NewLine                // Dump out an error message and return--we can't do anythingDi2015NewLine                // without an action and this request may have maliciousDi2015NewLine                // origins.Di2015NewLine                context.Response.Write( "Missing action." );Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // Now validate the shared password that all web applications in thisDi2015NewLine            // solution should be using.  This password will NEVER be placed on a user'sDi2015NewLine            // query string or ever passed over a public network.Di2015NewLine            string sharedPassword = context.Request.QueryString["sharedPassword"].ToSafeString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( string.IsNullOrEmpty( sharedPassword ) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.Response.Write( "Missing shared password." );Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // check that the shared password is actually validDi2015NewLine            if( sharedPassword != AppSettings.SharedPassword )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.Response.Write( "Invalid shared password." );Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // perform the specified actionDi2015NewLine            if( action == "CLEAR_CACHE" )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AppContext.ClearUserCaches();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Specifies whether or not the instance is reusable.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public bool IsReusableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3825224Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GetPermutations<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> result = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result =  Di2015NewLine                from seq in result Di2015NewLine                from item in source.Except(seq)Di2015NewLine                select seq.Concat(new[] { item }); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3825351Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void CreateObjectOnBlockTable(DBObject dbObject) {Di2015NewLine  PerformActionOnBlockTable((transaction, blockTableRecord) => {Di2015NewLine    blockTableRecord.AppendEntity(dbObject);  Di2015NewLine    transaction.AddNewlyCreatedDBObject(dbObject, true);    Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void PerformActionOnBlockTable(Action<Transaction, BlockTableRecord> action) {  Di2015NewLine  using (var lockedDocument = Application.DocumentManager.MdiActiveDocument.LockDocument())  Di2015NewLine  using (var database = Application.DocumentManager.MdiActiveDocument.Database)  Di2015NewLine  using (var transaction = database.TransactionManager.StartTransaction()) { Di2015NewLine    // Open the block table for read  Di2015NewLine    var blockTable = (BlockTable)transaction.GetObject(database.BlockTableId, OpenMode.ForRead);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open the block table record model space for write  Di2015NewLine    var blockTableRecord = (BlockTableRecord)transaction.GetObject(blockTable[BlockTableRecord.ModelSpace], OpenMode.ForWrite);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Run specific logicDi2015NewLine    action(transaction, blockTableRecord);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    transaction.Commit();  Di2015NewLine  }  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

3825451Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass PointCloudDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Point3DCollection Points { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler AllThreadsCompleted;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PointCloud()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Points = new Point3DCollection(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var task1 = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => AddPoints(0, 0, 192));Di2015NewLine        var task2 = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => AddPoints(1, 193, 384));Di2015NewLine        var task3 = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => AddPoints(2, 385, 576));Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.ContinueWhenAll(Di2015NewLine            new[] { task1, task2, task3 }, Di2015NewLine            OnAllTasksCompleted, // Call this method when all tasks finish.Di2015NewLine            CancellationToken.None, Di2015NewLine            TaskContinuationOptions.None,Di2015NewLine            TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext()); // Finish on UI thread.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnAllTasksCompleted(Task<List<Point3D>>[] completedTasks)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Now that we've got our points, add them to our collection.Di2015NewLine        foreach (var task in completedTasks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            task.Result.ForEach(point => this.points.Add(point));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Raise the AllThreadsCompleted event.Di2015NewLine        if (AllThreadsCompleted != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AllThreadsCompleted(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<Point3D> AddPoints(int scanNum, int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       const int goodValue = 42;Di2015NewLine       var result = new List<Point3D>(500);Di2015NewLine       var points = from pointX in Enumerable.Range(0, x)Di2015NewLine                    from pointY in Enumerable.Range(0, y)Di2015NewLine                    let pointZ = FindZ(pointX, pointY)Di2015NewLine                    where pointZ == goodValueDi2015NewLine                    select new Point3D(pointX, pointX, pointZ);Di2015NewLine       result.AddRange(points);Di2015NewLine       return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3829910Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string[] GetFileList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] downloadFiles;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        FtpWebRequest reqFTP;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            reqFTP = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(new Uri("ftp://" + ftpServerIP + "/"));Di2015NewLine            reqFTP.UseBinary = true;Di2015NewLine            reqFTP.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(ftpUserID, ftpPassword);Di2015NewLine            reqFTP.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory;Di2015NewLine            WebResponse response = reqFTP.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            while (line != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Append(line);Di2015NewLine                result.Append("\\n");Di2015NewLine                line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // to remove the trailing '\\n'Di2015NewLine            result.Remove(result.ToString().LastIndexOf('\\n'), 1);Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine            response.Close();Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString().Split('\\n');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            downloadFiles = null;Di2015NewLine            return downloadFiles;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

= -1,Di2015NewLine   Ejected  = 0,Di2015NewLine   Inserted = 1,Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #region MonitoringDi2015NewLine  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Starts the monitoring of device.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="path"></param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="mediaEvent"></param>Di2015NewLine  public void Monitor( string path, MediaEvent mediaEvent ) {Di2015NewLine   if( null == mediaEvent ) {Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException( "Media event cannot be null!" );Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //In case same class was called make sure only one instance is runningDi2015NewLine   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine   this.Exit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Keep logica drive to checkDi2015NewLine   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine   this.m_logicalDrive = this.GetLogicalDrive( path );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   WqlEventQuery wql;Di2015NewLine   ManagementOperationObserver observer = newDi2015NewLine       ManagementOperationObserver();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Bind to local machineDi2015NewLine   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine   ConnectionOptions opt = new ConnectionOptions();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Sets required privilegeDi2015NewLine   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine   opt.EnablePrivileges = true;Di2015NewLine   ManagementScope scope = new ManagementScope( "root\\\\CIMV2", opt );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   try {Di2015NewLine    wql = new WqlEventQuery();Di2015NewLine    wql.EventClassName = "__InstanceModificationEvent";Di2015NewLine    wql.WithinInterval = new TimeSpan( 0, 0, 1 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wql.Condition = String.Format( @"TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_LogicalDisk' and TargetInstance.DeviceId = '{0}'", this.m_logicalDrive );Di2015NewLine    this.m_managementEventWatcher = new ManagementEventWatcher( scope, wql );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Register async. event handlerDi2015NewLine    /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine    this.m_managementEventWatcher.EventArrived += new EventArrivedEventHandler( mediaEvent.MediaEventArrived );Di2015NewLine    this.m_managementEventWatcher.Start();Di2015NewLine   } catch( Exception e ) {Di2015NewLine    this.Exit();Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception( "Media Check: "  + e.Message );Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Stops the monitoring of device.</summary>Di2015NewLine  public void Exit( ) {Di2015NewLine   //In case same class was called make sure only one instance is runningDi2015NewLine   /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine   if( null != this.m_managementEventWatcher ) {Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine     this.m_managementEventWatcher.Stop();Di2015NewLine     this.m_managementEventWatcher = null;Di2015NewLine    } catch {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #region HelpersDi2015NewLine  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private DriveStatus m_driveStatus = DriveStatus.Unknown;Di2015NewLine  /// <summary>Triggers the event when change on device occured.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="sender"></param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine  private void MediaEventArrived( object sender, EventArrivedEventArgs e ) {Di2015NewLine   // Get the Event object and display itDi2015NewLine   PropertyData pd = e.NewEvent.Properties["TargetInstance"];Di2015NewLine   DriveStatus driveStatus = this.m_driveStatus;Di2015NewLine   if( pd != null ) {Di2015NewLine    ManagementBaseObject mbo = pd.Value as ManagementBaseObject;Di2015NewLine    System.IO.DriveInfo info = new System.IO.DriveInfo( (string)mbo.Properties["DeviceID"].Value );Di2015NewLine    driveStatus = info.IsReady ? DriveStatus.Inserted : DriveStatus.Ejected;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if( driveStatus != this.m_driveStatus ){Di2015NewLine    this.m_driveStatus = driveStatus;Di2015NewLine    if( null != MediaWatcher ) {Di2015NewLine     MediaWatcher( sender, driveStatus );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Gets the logical drive of a given path.</summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="path"></param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine  private string GetLogicalDrive( string path ) {Di2015NewLine   System.IO.DirectoryInfo dirInfo = new System.IO.DirectoryInfo( path );Di2015NewLine   string root = dirInfo.Root.FullName;Di2015NewLine   string logicalDrive = root.Remove( root.IndexOf( System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar ) );Di2015NewLine   return logicalDrive;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3839132Di2015UniqueSeparator// <T> is the type of data in the list.Di2015NewLine// If you have a List<int>, for example, then call this as follows:Di2015NewLine// List<int> ListOfInt;Di2015NewLine// DataTable ListTable = BuildDataTable<int>(ListOfInt);Di2015NewLinepublic static DataTable BuildDataTable<T>(IList<T> lst)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //create DataTable StructureDi2015NewLine  DataTable tbl = CreateTable<T>();Di2015NewLine  Type entType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine  PropertyDescriptorCollection properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(entType);Di2015NewLine  //get the list item and add into the listDi2015NewLine  foreach (T item in lst)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    DataRow row = tbl.NewRow();Di2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      row[prop.Name] = prop.GetValue(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    tbl.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return tbl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate DataTable CreateTable<T>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //T â€“> ClassNameDi2015NewLine  Type entType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine  //set the datatable name as class nameDi2015NewLine  DataTable tbl = new DataTable(entType.Name);Di2015NewLine  //get the property listDi2015NewLine  PropertyDescriptorCollection properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(entType);Di2015NewLine  foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in properties)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //add property as columnDi2015NewLine    tbl.Columns.Add(prop.Name, prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return tbl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3839518Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Timers;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Timer2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static System.Timers.Timer aTimer;Di2015NewLine    private static List<string> errors = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    private static readonly int interval = 300000;  // 5 minutes at presentDi2015NewLine    private static readonly int trigger = 10;       // send msg if > 10 errorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Message processing - error detectionDi2015NewLine    public static void processMessage(Message message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // do the work hereDi2015NewLine      // then check errorDi2015NewLine      if (message.HasError)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // add error to pending listDi2015NewLine        lock (errors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          string newErrorData = "got another one!";Di2015NewLine          errors.Add(newErrorData);Di2015NewLine          ++trigger;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Normally, the timer is declared at the class level,Di2015NewLine        // so that it stays in scope as long as it is needed.Di2015NewLine        // If the timer is declared in a long-running method,  Di2015NewLine        // KeepAlive must be used to prevent the JIT compiler Di2015NewLine        // from allowing aggressive garbage collection to occur Di2015NewLine        // before the method ends. (See end of method.)Di2015NewLine        //System.Timers.Timer aTimer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a timer with specified interval.Di2015NewLine        aTimer = new System.Timers.Timer(interval);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Hook up the event handler for the Elapsed event.Di2015NewLine        aTimer.Elapsed += new ElapsedEventHandler(OnTimedEvent);Di2015NewLine        aTimer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Kick off message handling - don't forget to clean up the timer when Di2015NewLine        // you wish to exitDi2015NewLine        while (moreMessages)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           Message message = getNextmessage();Di2015NewLine           ProcessMessage(message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // cleanup here when messages are drainedDi2015NewLine        // If the timer is declared in a long-running method, useDi2015NewLine        // KeepAlive to prevent garbage collection from occurringDi2015NewLine        // before the method ends.Di2015NewLine        //GC.KeepAlive(aTimer);        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnTimedEvent(object source, ElapsedEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object errorEmail = null;Di2015NewLine        lock (errors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (errors.Count > trigger)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               // init message to contain errors hereDi2015NewLine               errorEmail = new ErrorEmail();Di2015NewLine               foreach (string err in errors)Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  // add error info to messageDi2015NewLine               } Di2015NewLine               errors.Clear();Di2015NewLine               trigger = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (errorEmail != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // send message outside the lockDi2015NewLine          Send(errorEmail);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3841339Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PhpStyleDynamicMethodDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void __call(Type @class, object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do stuff here.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object CallOrDefault(this object b, string method, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methods = b.GetType().GetMethods().Where(m => m.Name == method && DoParametersMatch(m.GetParameters(), parameters));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var count = methods.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count == 1)Di2015NewLine            return methods.Single().Invoke(b, parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count > 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("could not resolve a single method.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        __call(b.GetType(), parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool DoParametersMatch(ParameterInfo[] parameters, object[] values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parameters == null && values == null) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (parameters == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (values == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (parameters.Length != values.Length) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameter = parameters[i];Di2015NewLine            var value = values[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!parameter.GetType().IsAssignableFrom(value.GetType()))Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3842589Di2015UniqueSeparator private void BeginRequest(Object source, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null == HttpContext.Current || String.IsNullOrEmpty(HttpContext.Current.Request.Headers["Authorization"]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.StatusCode = (Int32)HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized;Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.End();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpContext context = HttpContext.Current;Di2015NewLine        Regex matcher = new Regex(WfmConfigurationManager.GetAppSetting("AuthenticationPath"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!matcher.IsMatch(context.Request.Url.ToString(),0))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String authHeader = context.Request.Headers["Authorization"];Di2015NewLine            IIdentity tokenIdentity = new TokenIdentity(authHeader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!tokenIdentity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.StatusCode = (Int32)HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized;Di2015NewLine                HttpContext.Current.Response.End();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IPrincipal tokenPrincipal = new TokenPrincipal(tokenIdentity, TokenAuthentication.GetRolesForUser(tokenIdentity));Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.User = tokenPrincipal;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3844843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type GetType()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(Program);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this is oversimplified implementation,Di2015NewLine    //but I want to show the main differencesDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsInstOf(object o, Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //calling GetType on System.ObjectDi2015NewLine        return o.GetType().IsAssignableFrom(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyClass mc = new MyClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //calling MyClass non-virtual version for GetType methodDi2015NewLine        if (mc.GetType() == typeof(Program))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Yep, this condition is trueDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Not surprised!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Calling System.Object non-virtual version for GetType methodDi2015NewLine        if (IsInstOf(mc, typeof(Program)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Nope, this condition isn't met!Di2015NewLine            //because mc.GetType() != ((object)mc).GetType()!Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3845251Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static double[,] ConvertMatrix(double[] flat, int m, int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (flat.Length != m * n)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid length");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        double[,] ret = new double[m, n];Di2015NewLine        // BlockCopy uses byte lengths: a double is 8 bytesDi2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(flat, 0, ret, 0, flat.Length * sizeof(double));Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double[] d = { 2, 5, 3, 5, 1, 6 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double[,] matrix = ConvertMatrix(d, 3, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("matrix[{0},{1}] = {2}", i, j, matrix[i, j]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3846862Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DynamicEventDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, Action<object[]>> delegates = new Dictionary<int, Action<object[]>>();Di2015NewLine    public ScriptEngine Engine { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicEvent(ScriptEngine engine)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Engine = engine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void addHandler(PythonFunction pythonFunction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int args = (int) pythonFunction.func_code.co_nlocals;Di2015NewLine        delegates.Add(args, a => Engine.Operations.Invoke(pythonFunction, a));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void addHandler(Delegate d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int args = d.Method.GetParameters().Length;Di2015NewLine        delegates.Add(args, a => d.DynamicInvoke(a));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void invoke(params object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action<object[]> action;Di2015NewLine        if(!delegates.TryGetValue(args.Length, out action))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("There is no handler that takes " + args.Length + " arguments!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        action(args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3847009Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void MyMethod(Flags flag)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Define action-lookupDi2015NewLine    var actionsByFlag = new Dictionary<Flags, Action>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { Flags.p1, DoSomething},Di2015NewLine        { Flags.p2, DosomethingElse},Di2015NewLine        { Flags.p3, DosomethingElseAgain},Di2015NewLine        { Flags.p4, DosomethingElseAgainAndAgain},Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find applicable actionsDi2015NewLine    var actions = actionsByFlag.Where(kvp => (flag & kvp.Key) == kvp.Key)Di2015NewLine                               .Select(kvp => kvp.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Execute applicable actionsDi2015NewLine    foreach (var action in actions)Di2015NewLine       action();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3848450Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyWorker<T> : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<T> _taskQueue; // task queueDi2015NewLine    private readonly object _threadLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    private Thread _thread; // worker threadDi2015NewLine    private ManualResetEvent _evExit;Di2015NewLine    private AutoResetEvent _evNewData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Override this to process data.</summary>Di2015NewLine    protected abstract void ProcessData(T data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Override this to set other thread priority.</summary>Di2015NewLine    protected virtual ThreadPriority ThreadPriorityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return ThreadPriority.BelowNormal; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected MyWorker()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _taskQueue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine        _evExit = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        _evNewData = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ~MyWorker()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ThreadProc()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var wh = new WaitHandle[] { _evExit, _evNewData };Di2015NewLine            while(true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T data = default(T);Di2015NewLine                bool gotData = false;Di2015NewLine                lock(_taskQueue) // syncDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if(_taskQueue.Count != 0) // have data?Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        data = _taskQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                        gotData = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if(!gotData)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if(WaitHandle.WaitAny(wh) == 0) return; // demanded stopDi2015NewLine                    continue; //we have data now, grab itDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ProcessData(data);Di2015NewLine                if(_evExit.WaitOne(0)) return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(ThreadInterruptedException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // log warning - this is not normalDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(ThreadAbortException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // log warning - this is not normalDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_threadLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_thread != null)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Already running.");Di2015NewLine            _thread = new Thread(ThreadProc)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Name = "Worker Thread",Di2015NewLine                IsBackground = true,Di2015NewLine                Priority = ThreadPriority,Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_threadLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_thread == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Is not running.");Di2015NewLine            _evExit.Set();Di2015NewLine            if(!_thread.Join(1000))Di2015NewLine                _thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine            _thread = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Enqueue data for processing.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public void EnqueueData(T data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_taskQueue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _taskQueue.Enqueue(data);Di2015NewLine            _evNewData.Set(); // wake thread if it is sleepingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Clear all pending data processing requests.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public void ClearData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_taskQueue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _taskQueue.Clear();Di2015NewLine            _evNewData.Reset();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_threadLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_thread != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _evExit.Set();Di2015NewLine                if(!_thread.Join(1000))Di2015NewLine                    _thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine                _thread = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _evExit.Close();Di2015NewLine        _evNewData.Close();Di2015NewLine        if(disposing)Di2015NewLine            _taskQueue.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3851534Di2015UniqueSeparator/ip:(.{0,25}?)\\/Di2015NewLine
3851534Di2015UniqueSeparator/         <- The delimiter of your regexDi2015NewLine    ip:       <- Matches the "ip:" partDi2015NewLine    (             <- Open a capture groupDi2015NewLine        .         <- Matches any character Di2015NewLine        {0,25}    <- Last part repeated between 0 and 25 timesDi2015NewLine        ?         <- Ungreedy modifier, to capture less elements possible (in the 0, 25 limit)Di2015NewLine    )         <- End of the capture groupDi2015NewLine    \\         <- The "\\" partDi2015NewLine/         <- End of the regexDi2015NewLine
3851534Di2015UniqueSeparator@"ip:(.{0,25}?)\\\\" //Don't forget to escape the \\ Di2015NewLine
3851566Di2015UniqueSeparatorstateStack.Peek()
3851566Di2015UniqueSeparator    enum ParserStateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Text,Di2015NewLine        Bracketed,Di2015NewLine        Quoted,Di2015NewLine        EscapChar,Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static IEnumerable<string> Split(string str, char sep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lastIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine        char c;Di2015NewLine        ParserState s;Di2015NewLine        Stack<ParserState> state = new Stack<ParserState>();Di2015NewLine        state.Push(ParserState.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < str.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            c = str[i];Di2015NewLine            s = state.Peek();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (s == ParserState.EscapCharDi2015NewLine                || (s == ParserState.Bracketed && c == ']')Di2015NewLine                || (s == ParserState.Quoted && c == '"'))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                state.Pop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '[')Di2015NewLine                state.Push(ParserState.Bracketed);Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '"')Di2015NewLine                state.Push(ParserState.Quoted);Di2015NewLine            else if (c == '\\\\')Di2015NewLine                state.Push(ParserState.EscapChar);Di2015NewLine            else if (s == ParserState.Text && c == sep)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return str.Substring(lastIdx, i - lastIdx);Di2015NewLine                lastIdx = i + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return str.Substring(lastIdx);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3852420Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encode(IEnumerable<GeoLocation> points)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var str = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var encodeDiff = (Action<int>)(diff => {Di2015NewLine        int shifted = diff << 1;Di2015NewLine        if (diff < 0)Di2015NewLine            shifted = ~shifted;Di2015NewLine        int rem = shifted;Di2015NewLine        while (rem >= 0x20)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            str.Append((char)((0x20 | (rem & 0x1f)) + 63));Di2015NewLine            rem >>= 5;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        str.Append((char)(rem + 63));Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastLat = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lastLng = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var point in points)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lat = (int)Math.Round(point.Latitude * 1E5);Di2015NewLine        int lng = (int)Math.Round(point.Longitude * 1E5);Di2015NewLine        encodeDiff(lat - lastLat);Di2015NewLine        encodeDiff(lng - lastLng);Di2015NewLine        lastLat = lat;Di2015NewLine        lastLng = lng;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return str.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3856090Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ExistsOnPath(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (GetFullPath(fileName) != null)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GetFullPath(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(fileName))Di2015NewLine        return Path.GetFullPath(fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var values = Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable("PATH");Di2015NewLine    foreach (var path in values.Split(';'))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fullPath = Path.Combine(path, fileName);Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(fullPath))Di2015NewLine            return fullPath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3856192Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int DamerauLevenshteinDistance(string string1, string string2, int threshold)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Return trivial case - where they are equalDi2015NewLine        if (string1.Equals(string2))Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return trivial case - where one is emptyDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(string1) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(string2))Di2015NewLine            return (string1 ?? "").Length + (string2 ?? "").Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ensure string2 (inner cycle) is longerDi2015NewLine        if (string1.Length > string2.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tmp = string1;Di2015NewLine            string1 = string2;Di2015NewLine            string2 = tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return trivial case - where string1 is contained within string2Di2015NewLine        if (string2.Contains(string1))Di2015NewLine            return string2.Length - string1.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var length1 = string1.Length;Di2015NewLine        var length2 = string2.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var d = new int[length1 + 1, length2 + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i <= d.GetUpperBound(0); i++)Di2015NewLine            d[i, 0] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i <= d.GetUpperBound(1); i++)Di2015NewLine            d[0, i] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 1; i <= d.GetUpperBound(0); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var im1 = i - 1;Di2015NewLine            var im2 = i - 2;Di2015NewLine            var minDistance = threshold;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var j = 1; j <= d.GetUpperBound(1); j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var jm1 = j - 1;Di2015NewLine                var jm2 = j - 2;Di2015NewLine                var cost = string1[im1] == string2[jm1] ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var del = d[im1, j] + 1;Di2015NewLine                var ins = d[i, jm1] + 1;Di2015NewLine                var sub = d[im1, jm1] + cost;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Math.Min is slower than native codeDi2015NewLine                //d[i, j] = Math.Min(del, Math.Min(ins, sub));Di2015NewLine                d[i, j] = del <= ins && del <= sub ? del : ins <= sub ? ins : sub;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (i > 1 && j > 1 && string1[im1] == string2[jm2] && string1[im2] == string2[jm1])Di2015NewLine                    d[i, j] = Math.Min(d[i, j], d[im2, jm2] + cost);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (d[i, j] < minDistance)Di2015NewLine                    minDistance = d[i, j];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (minDistance > threshold)Di2015NewLine                return int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return d[d.GetUpperBound(0), d.GetUpperBound(1)] > threshold Di2015NewLine            ? int.MaxValue Di2015NewLine            : d[d.GetUpperBound(0), d.GetUpperBound(1)];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3856208Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Diagnostics.Process

3857980Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SwappablePairDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long m_pair;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SwappablePair(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_pair = ((long)x << 32) | (uint)y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reads the values of X and Y atomically.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void GetValues(out int x, out int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long current = Interlocked.Read(ref m_pair);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = (int)(current >> 32);Di2015NewLine        y = (int)(current & 0xffffffff);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the values of X and Y atomically.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void SetValues(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If you wanted, you could also take the return value hereDi2015NewLine        // and set two out int parameters to indicate what the previousDi2015NewLine        // values were.Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.Exchange(ref m_pair, ((long)x << 32) | (uint)y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3857980Di2015UniqueSeparatorSwap
3857980Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Swaps the values of X and Y atomically.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic void Swap()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long orig, swapped;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        orig = Interlocked.Read(ref m_pair);Di2015NewLine        swapped = orig << 32 | (uint)(orig >> 32);Di2015NewLine    } while (Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref m_pair, swapped, orig) != orig);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3860372Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ResultExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Result<TResult> Select<TSource, TResult>(this Result<TSource> source, Func<TSource, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source.IsError) return new Result<TResult>(source.Error);Di2015NewLine        return new Result<TResult>(selector(source.Value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Result<TResult> SelectMany<TSource, TResult>(this Result<TSource> source, Func<TSource, Result<TResult>> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source.IsError) return new Result<TResult>(source.Error);Di2015NewLine        return selector(source.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Result<TResult> SelectMany<TSource, TIntermediate, TResult>(this Result<TSource> source, Func<TSource, Result<TIntermediate>> intermediateSelector, Func<TSource, TIntermediate, TResult> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source.IsError) return new Result<TResult>(source.Error);Di2015NewLine        var intermediate = intermediateSelector(source.Value);Di2015NewLine        if (intermediate.IsError) return new Result<TResult>(intermediate.Error);Di2015NewLine        return new Result<TResult>(resultSelector(source.Value, intermediate.Value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3864082Di2015UniqueSeparatorPasswordDeriveBytes
3864082Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <string.h>Di2015NewLine#include <stdlib.h>Di2015NewLine#include <openssl/sha.h>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid pbkdf1(const char *password, const char *salt, long iter, unsigned char dk[SHA_DIGEST_LENGTH])Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    size_t pwlen = strlen(password);Di2015NewLine    size_t dlen = pwlen + 8;Di2015NewLine    unsigned char *buf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (dlen > SHA_DIGEST_LENGTH)Di2015NewLine        buf = malloc(dlen);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        buf = malloc(SHA_DIGEST_LENGTH);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    memcpy(buf, password, pwlen);Di2015NewLine    strncpy((char *)buf + pwlen, salt, 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (iter-- > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SHA1(buf, dlen, buf);Di2015NewLine        dlen = SHA_DIGEST_LENGTH;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    memcpy(dk, buf, SHA_DIGEST_LENGTH);Di2015NewLine    free(buf);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3864420Di2015UniqueSeparator// a simple Plain Old C Object that describes business methods.Di2015NewLinepublic class BusinessMethodDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // user-friendly nameDi2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    // type that actually implementsDi2015NewLine    public Type ImplementationType { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ... meanwhile, back on the ranch ...Di2015NewLinepublic void OnBusinessMethodSelection ()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // 1. if selected Di2015NewLine    if (BusinessMethodList.SelectedItem != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 2. retrieve selected itemDi2015NewLine        BusinessMethod selected = Di2015NewLine            (BusinessMethod)(BusinessMethodList.SelectedItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 3. request implementation of selected item fromDi2015NewLine        // IoC containerDi2015NewLine        object implementation = Di2015NewLine            _container.Resolve (selected.ImplementationType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3864420Di2015UniqueSeparator// an example of a strongly typed subject. notice how subjectDi2015NewLine// defines content. semanticly, when someone creates and publishesDi2015NewLine// an instance of this subject, they are requesting someone showDi2015NewLine// an analysis view based on data content,Di2015NewLinepublic class AnalysisSubjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // subject content, in this case a data result fromDi2015NewLine    // a business methodDi2015NewLine    public object Data { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MainWindow : ISubscriber<AnalysisSubject> ...Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use whatever implementation of an IoC container we likeDi2015NewLine    // here i assume we abstract from implementation and use aDi2015NewLine    // custom interface IContainer that exposes functionality Di2015NewLine    // that we needDi2015NewLine    private readonly IContainer _container = null;Di2015NewLine    public class MainWindow ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we're teh r00tz! we create an instance of IoCDi2015NewLine        // container for use throughout applicationDi2015NewLine        IContainer _container = new CustomContainer ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // our container exposes both parameterized andDi2015NewLine        // type-parameterized resolve methodsDi2015NewLine        IEventHub events = _container.Resolve<IEventHub> ();Di2015NewLine        events.Subscribe<AnalysisSubject> (this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ISubscriber<AnalysisSubject>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // part of strongly typed subscriptions is that weDi2015NewLine    // may now handle strongly typed publications! yay!Di2015NewLine    public void Receive (AnalysisSubject subject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // 1. request to display analysis of dataDi2015NewLine        Type analysisType = subject.Data.GetType ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 2. get view control based on payload typeDi2015NewLine        // Di2015NewLine        // NOTE: implicit usage below is not consistentDi2015NewLine        // with previous invocations, here we are submittingDi2015NewLine        // a type of something we already have, and actuallyDi2015NewLine        // want back something that knows how to handle it.Di2015NewLine        // most IoC containers can provide this functionalityDi2015NewLine        // through "facilities" add ons that accept a Di2015NewLine        // parameter\\discriminator like below, and produce Di2015NewLine        // something in return.Di2015NewLine        Control control = (Control)(_container.Resolve (analysisType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // [alternatively] if the above is too "magical" whereDi2015NewLine        // IAnalysisFactory is an interface we define for thisDi2015NewLine        // express purposeDi2015NewLine        //IAnalysisFactory factory = _container.Resolve<IAnalysisFactory> ();Di2015NewLine        //Control control = factory.GetAnalysisControlFor (analysisType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 3. assign subject data to controlDi2015NewLine        Control.DataContext = subject.Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 4. display controlDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3864420Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SomeBusinessViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly IEventHub _events = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we cannot function without an event aggregator ofDi2015NewLine    // some kind, so we declare our dependency as a contructorDi2015NewLine    // dependencyDi2015NewLine    public SomeBusinessView (IEventHub events)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _events = events;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoMyThang ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // 1. do some businessDi2015NewLine        MyBusinessData data = SomeBusinessFunction ();Di2015NewLine        // 2. publish complete eventDi2015NewLine        AnalysisSubject subject = new AnalysisSubject () { Data = data, };Di2015NewLine        _events.Publish (subject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        public int Width;Di2015NewLine        public string Color;Di2015NewLine        public int Address;Di2015NewLine        public int Offset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class GameRowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public List<GamePiece> Row = new List<GamePiece>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void initializeBoard(GamePiece[] board) {Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 1; i < board.Length; i++) board[i] = EmptyPiece(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private GamePiece EmptyPiece(int address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new GamePieceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Address = address,Di2015NewLine            Width = 1,Di2015NewLine            Color = "Gray",Di2015NewLine            Offset = 0Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int ComputeRow(int address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ((address - 1) / COLS);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void processDictionary(GamePiece[] board, Dictionary<int,GamePiece> d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var piece in d.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < piece.Width; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                board[piece.Address - piece.Offset + i] = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            board[piece.Address] = piece;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private GameRow[] convertBoardtoRows(GamePiece[] board)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rows = new GameRow[ROWS];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < rows.Length; i++) rows[i] = new GameRow();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < board.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (board[i] != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rows[ComputeRow(i)].Row.Add(board[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return rows;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GameRow[] ProcessPieces(Dictionary<int, GamePiece> dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GamePiece[] board = new GamePiece[ROWS*COLS+1];Di2015NewLine        initializeBoard(board);Di2015NewLine        processDictionary(board, dictionary);Di2015NewLine        return convertBoardtoRows(board);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    [TestMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void TestMethod1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dictionary = new Dictionary<int, GamePiece>();Di2015NewLine        dictionary.Add(1, new GamePiece { Address = 2, Width = 1, Offset = 0, Color = "Yellow" });Di2015NewLine "Yellow" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rows = ProcessPieces(dictionary);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(rows[0].Row.Count == 6);Di2015NewLine rows[0].Row.Where(p => p.Color == "Yellow").First();Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(piece.Address == 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(rows[1].Row.Count == 5);Di2015NewLine Assert.IsTrue(rows[1].Row.Where(p => p.Address == 11).Count() == 0);Di2015NewLine        piece = rows[1].Row.Where(p => p.Color == "Yellow").First();Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(piece.Address == 12);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(rows[2].Row.Count == 6);Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(rows[2].Row.Where(p => p.Color == "Yellow").Count() == 0);Di2015NewLine 3869282Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class WorkflowFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Singleton instance of the workflow runtimeDi2015NewLine    private static WorkflowRuntime _workflowRuntime = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Lock (sync) objectDi2015NewLine    private static object _syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Factory methodDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static WorkflowRuntime GetWorkflowRuntime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Lock execution thread in case of multi-threadedDi2015NewLine        // (concurrent) access.Di2015NewLine        lock (_syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check for startup conditionDi2015NewLine            if (null == _workflowRuntime)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Provide for shutdownDi2015NewLine                AppDomain.CurrentDomain.ProcessExit += new EventHandler(StopWorkflowRuntime);Di2015NewLine                AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DomainUnload += new EventHandler(StopWorkflowRuntime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Not started, so create instanceDi2015NewLine                _workflowRuntime = new WorkflowRuntime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Start the runtimeDi2015NewLine                _workflowRuntime.StartRuntime();Di2015NewLine            } // ifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return singleton instanceDi2015NewLine            return _workflowRuntime;Di2015NewLine        } // lockDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Shutdown methodDi2015NewLine    static void StopWorkflowRuntime(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_workflowRuntime != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_workflowRuntime.IsStarted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Stop the runtimeDi2015NewLine                    _workflowRuntime.StopRuntime();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (ObjectDisposedException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Already disposed of, so ignore...Di2015NewLine                } // catchDi2015NewLine            } // ifDi2015NewLine        } // ifDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3869282Di2015UniqueSeparatorWorkflowFactory.GetWorkflowRuntime();Di2015NewLine
3869282Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ApprovalWorkflowRunner : IApprovalWorkflowRunnerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static ILogger Logger { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private static IRepository Repository { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ApprovalWorkflowRunner(ILogger logger, IRepository repository)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Logger = logger;Di2015NewLine        Repository = repository;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Request Execute(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = new                           {Di2015NewLine                                                    if (e.WorkflowInstance != instance) return;Di2015NewLine });Di2015NewLine        workflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated += ((sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine                                                {Di2015NewLine                                                    if (e.WorkflowInstance != instance) return;Di2015NewLine                                                    waitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine                                                    Logger.LogError(e.Exception, true, action.Serialize());Di2015NewLine                                                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parameters = new Dictionary<string, workflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow(typeof (ApprovalFlow), parameters);Di2015NewLine        instance.Start();Di2015NewLine        waitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return request;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3870472Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ReplaceRegexDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ReplaceWithX("12345678"));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ReplaceWithXLeave4("12345678"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string ReplaceWithX(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Regex.Replace(input, ".", "x");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string ReplaceWithXLeave4(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Regex.Replace(input, ".(?!.{0,3}$)", "x");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3874078Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CurrentNext<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Current { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public T Next { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CurrentNext(T current, T next)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Current = current;Di2015NewLine        Next = next;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<CurrentNext<T>> ToCurrentNextEnumerable<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var source = enumerable.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new CurrentNext<T>(current, enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine            current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3874184Di2015UniqueSeparatorThread
3874184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WorkerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private Thread m_Thread = new Thread(Run);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public event EventHandler<ProgressEventArgs> Progress;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Start()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    m_Thread.Start();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void Run()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Do some work.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      OnProgress(new ProgressEventArgs(...));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Do some work.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void OnProgress(ProgressEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get a copy of the multicast delegate so that we can do theDi2015NewLine    // null check and invocation safely. This works because delegates areDi2015NewLine    // immutable. Remember to create a memory barrier so that a fresh readDi2015NewLine    // of the delegate occurs everytime. This is done via a simple lock below.Di2015NewLine    EventHandler<ProgressEventArgs> local;Di2015NewLine    lock (this)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var local = Progress;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (local != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      local(this, args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3874184Di2015UniqueSeparatorProgress
3874184Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhile
3874184Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static event EventHandler Progress;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var thread = new Thread(Di2015NewLine            () =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var local = GetEvent();Di2015NewLine                while (local == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    local = GetEvent();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        Progress += (s, a) => { Console.WriteLine("Progress"); };Di2015NewLine        thread.Join();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Stopped");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static EventHandler GetEvent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Thread.MemoryBarrier();Di2015NewLine        var local = Progress;Di2015NewLine        return local;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3874184Di2015UniqueSeparatorThread.MemoryBarrier

3875619Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsEqual
3875619Di2015UniqueSeparatora==0
3875619Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static boolean nearlyEqual(float a, float b, float epsilon) {Di2015NewLine        final float absA = Math.abs(a);Di2015NewLine        final float absB = Math.abs(b);Di2015NewLine        final float diff = Math.abs(a - b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (a == b) { // shortcut, handles infinitiesDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        } else if (a == 0 || b == 0 || diff < Float.MIN_NORMAL) {Di2015NewLine            // a or b is zero or both are extremely close to itDi2015NewLine            // relative error is less meaningful hereDi2015NewLine            return diff < (epsilon * Float.MIN_NORMAL);Di2015NewLine        } else { // use relative errorDi2015NewLine            return diff / (absA + absB) < epsilon;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3875619Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool NearlyEqual(double a, double b, double epsilon)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double absA = Math.Abs(a);Di2015NewLine    double absB = Math.Abs(b);Di2015NewLine    double diff = Math.Abs(a - b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (a == b)Di2015NewLine    { // shortcut, handles infinitiesDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    else if (a == 0 || b == 0 || diff < Double.MinValue) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // a or b is zero or both are extremely close to itDi2015NewLine        // relative error is less meaningful hereDi2015NewLine        return diff < (epsilon * Double.MinValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    { // use relative errorDi2015NewLine        return diff / (absA + absB) < epsilon;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3877591Di2015UniqueSeparatorint count = collection.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// don't need to swap if there is only one elementDi2015NewLineif (count > 1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // have to run once for each letter Di2015NewLine    sortCollection(count);Di2015NewLine    sortCollection(count);      Di2015NewLine    sortCollection(count);Di2015NewLine    sortCollection(count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void sortCollection(int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (collection.Contains(collection['c']))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // take care of last elementDi2015NewLine        collection.Swap(count - 1, collection.IndexOf(collection['c']));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (collection.Contains(collection['a']) && collection.Contains(collection['b']))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // take care of middle elementsDi2015NewLine        if(collection[1] != collection['b'])Di2015NewLine        collection.Swap(collection['a'], collection['b']);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (collection.Contains(collection['d']))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // take care of first elementDi2015NewLine        if(collection[0] != collection['d'])Di2015NewLine        collection.Swap(0, collection.IndexOf(collection['d']));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3885727Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void dummyCell_MoveToNextColumn(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cell is the model object containing the parsing rules and raising eventsDi2015NewLine        var lSender = sender as Cell;Di2015NewLine        var gridItems = ViewGridReference.Items;Di2015NewLine        var lastItem = gridItems[gridItems.Count - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lSender == lastItem) {Di2015NewLine            // We are at the bottom of the columnDi2015NewLine            // Move the program on to the next columnDi2015NewLine            CurrentColumn++;Di2015NewLine            OnPropertyChanged("ItemPositions");Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            // Simulate "empty position" input for this cell and all cells down the columnDi2015NewLine            // Cells are validating themselves as the simulation progressesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Cell item in ViewGridReference.Items) {Di2015NewLine                item.ActualItemCode = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ViewGridReference.SelectedIndex = gridItems.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine            ViewGridReference.CurrentCell = new DataGridCellInfo(lastItem, ViewGridReference.Columns[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            (ViewGridReference.ItemsSource as ListCollectionView).EditItem(ViewGridReference.SelectedItem);Di2015NewLine            ((DataGridCell)ViewGridReference.SelectedItem).Focus();                                         Di2015NewLine        }                                   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3889488Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim validTags() As String =Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                "width",Di2015NewLine                "height",Di2015NewLine                "img"Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine
3889488Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim maxMatch As Integer = 0Di2015NewLineDim matchedTag As String = NothingDi2015NewLineFor Each Tag As String In validTagsDi2015NewLine    Dim match As Integer = checkMatch(Tag, source)Di2015NewLine    If match > maxMatch ThenDi2015NewLine        maxMatch = matchDi2015NewLine        matchedTag = TagDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDebug.WriteLine("matched tag {0} matched % {1}", matchedTag, maxMatch)Di2015NewLine
3889488Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function checkMatch(ByVal tag As String, ByVal source As String) As IntegerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If tag = source Then Return 100Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dim maxPercentage As Integer = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        For index As Integer = 0 To tag.Length - 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim tIndex As Integer = indexDi2015NewLine            Dim sIndex As Integer = 0Di2015NewLine            Dim matchCounter As Integer = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            While TrueDi2015NewLine                If tag(tIndex) = source(sIndex) ThenDi2015NewLine                    matchCounter += 1Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tIndex += 1Di2015NewLine                sIndex += 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                If tIndex + 1 > tag.Length OrElse sIndex + 1 > source.Length ThenDi2015NewLine                    Exit WhileDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            End WhileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim percentage As Integer = CInt(matchCounter * 100 / Math.Max(tag.Length, source.Length))Di2015NewLine            If percentage > maxPercentage Then maxPercentage = percentageDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Return maxPercentageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine

3893011Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Partition a list of elements into a smaller group of elementsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="list"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="totalPartitions"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static List<T>[] Partition<T>(List<T> list, int totalPartitions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (list == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("list");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (totalPartitions < 1)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("totalPartitions");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<T>[] partitions = new List<T>[totalPartitions];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int maxSize = (int)Math.Ceiling(list.Count / (double)totalPartitions);Di2015NewLine    int k = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < partitions.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        partitions[i] = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        for (int j = k; j < k + maxSize; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (j >= list.Count)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            partitions[i].Add(list[j]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        k += maxSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return partitions;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3894073Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DateHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string ToLocalizedLongTimeString(this DateTime target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ToLocalizedLongTimeString(target, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ToLocalizedLongTimeString(this DateTime target, Di2015NewLine        CultureInfo ci)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // I'm only looking for fr-CA because the OP mentioned this Di2015NewLine        // is specific to fr-CA situations...Di2015NewLine        if (ci.Name == "fr-CA")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (target.Minute == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return target.ToString("H' h'");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return target.ToString("H' h 'mm");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return target.ToLongTimeString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3903145Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Columns.Add("col1", "col1");Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Columns[0].CellTemplate.Style.Alignment = DataGridViewContentAlignment.MiddleRight;Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Columns.Add("col2", "col2");Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Columns.Add("col3", "col3");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Rows.Add();Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.CellEndEdit += new DataGridViewCellEventHandler(dataGridView1_CellEndEdit);Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.ColumnWidthChanged += new DataGridViewColumnEventHandler(dataGridView1_ColumnWidthChanged);              Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void dataGridView1_ColumnWidthChanged(object sender, DataGridViewColumnEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Column.Index == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We need to truncate everything again when the width changesDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataGridViewRow row in dataGridView1.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RightTruncateText(row.Cells[0]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void RightTruncateText(DataGridViewCell cell)Di2015NewLine    {                        Di2015NewLine        // check if the content is too long:Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromHwnd(this.Handle))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SizeF size = g.MeasureString((string)cell.Tag, dataGridView1.Font); // NOTE: using the tagDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (size.Width > cell.Size.Width)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder truncated = new StringBuilder((string)cell.Tag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                truncated.Insert(0, "...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Truncate the string until small enough (NOTE: not optimized in any way!)                        Di2015NewLine                while (size.Width > cell.Size.Width)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    truncated.Remove(3, 1);Di2015NewLine                    size = g.MeasureString(truncated.ToString(), dataGridView1.Font);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                cell.Value = truncated.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cell.Value = cell.Tag;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void dataGridView1_CellEndEdit(object sender, DataGridViewCellEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.ColumnIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Save the value in the tag but show the truncated valueDi2015NewLine            DataGridViewCell cell = dataGridView1.Rows[e.RowIndex].Cells[e.ColumnIndex];Di2015NewLine            cell.Tag = cell.Value; // Saving the actual stateDi2015NewLine            RightTruncateText(cell);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3903154Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Shared Function ProcessConfigurationTokens(ByVal Source As String) As StringDi2015NewLine    Dim page As Page = CType(Context.Handler, Page)Di2015NewLine    Dim tokens() As String = GetConfigurationTokens(Source)Di2015NewLine    Dim configurationName As String = ""Di2015NewLine    Dim configurationValue As String = ""Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For Each token As String In tokensDi2015NewLine        'Strip off the # signsDi2015NewLine        configurationName = token.Replace("#"c, "")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'Lookup the value in the configuration (if any)Di2015NewLine        configurationValue = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings(configurationName)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If configurationValue.Contains(".aspx") OrElse configurationValue.Contains("/") ThenDi2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                Source = Source.Replace(token, page.ResolveUrl(configurationValue))Di2015NewLine            CatchDi2015NewLine                Source = Source.Replace(token, configurationValue)Di2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            'This is an optimization - if the content doesn't containDi2015NewLine            'a forward slash we know it is not a url.Di2015NewLine            Source = Source.Replace(token, configurationValue)Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return SourceDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Shared Function GetConfigurationTokens(ByVal Source As String) As String()Di2015NewLine    'Locate any words in the source that are surrounded by # symbolsDi2015NewLine    'and return the list as an array.Di2015NewLine    Dim sc As New System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollectionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim r As RegexDi2015NewLine    Dim m As MatchDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(Source) ThenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        r = New Regex("#[^#\\s]+#", RegexOptions.Compiled Or RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)Di2015NewLine        m = r.Match(Source)Di2015NewLine        While m.SuccessDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sc.Add(m.Groups(0).Value)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m = m.NextMatchDi2015NewLine        End WhileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If Not sc.Count = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            Dim result(sc.Count - 1) As StringDi2015NewLine            sc.CopyTo(result, 0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Return resultDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return New String() {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
