3903476Di2015UniqueSeparator SteadyError += error ;
3903476Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat integral = Ki * SteadyError;
3903476Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat deltaTime = (LastCorrectionTime - DateTime.Now.Ticks) / 500000.0 
3903476Di2015UniqueSeparatorif ( SteadyError > MaxSteadyError ) SteadyError = MaxSteadyError;Di2015NewLineif ( SteadyError < MinSteadyError ) SteadyError = MinSteadyError;Di2015NewLine
3903476Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (error < -270) error += 360;Di2015NewLineif (error >  270) error -= 360;Di2015NewLine
3903476Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat derivative = Kd * (error - PrevError);Di2015NewLine
3903476Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void DoPID(object o)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Bring the LED up to signify frame startDi2015NewLine    BoardLED.Write(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get IMU headingDi2015NewLine    float currentHeading = (float)RazorIMU.Yaw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate errorDi2015NewLine    // (let's just assume CurrentHeading really is the current GPS heading, OK?)Di2015NewLine    float error = (TargetHeading - currentHeading);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    LCD.Lines[0].Text = "Heading: "+ currentHeading.ToString("F2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We calculated the error, but we need to make sure the error is set Di2015NewLine    // so that we will be correcting in the Di2015NewLine    // direction of least work. For example, if we are flying a heading Di2015NewLine    // of 2 degrees and the error is a few degreesDi2015NewLine    // to the left of that ( IE, somewhere around 360) there will be a Di2015NewLine    // large error and the rover will try to turn allDi2015NewLine    // the way around to correct, when it could just turn to the right Di2015NewLine    // a few degrees.Di2015NewLine    // In short, we are adjusting for the fact that a compass heading wraps Di2015NewLine    // around in a circle instead of continuing infinity on a lineDi2015NewLine    if (error < -270) error += 360;Di2015NewLine    if (error >  270) error -= 360;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the error calculated in this frame to the running totalDi2015NewLine    SteadyError += error;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( SteadyError > MaxSteadyError ) SteadyError = MaxSteadyError;Di2015NewLine    if ( SteadyError < MinSteadyError ) SteadyError = MinSteadyError;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    LCD.Lines[2].Text = "Error:   " + error.ToString("F2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate proportional termDi2015NewLine    float proportional = Kp * error;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate integral termDi2015NewLine    float integral = Ki * SteadyError ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate derivative termDi2015NewLine    float derivative = Kd * (error - PrevError) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add them all together to get the correction deltaDi2015NewLine    // Set the steering servo to the correctionDi2015NewLine    Steering.Degree = 90 + proportional + integral + derivative;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // At this point, the current PID frame is finishedDi2015NewLine    // ------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine    // Now, we need to setup for the next PID frame and close outDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The "current" error is now the previous errorDi2015NewLine    // (Remember, we are done with the current frame, so inDi2015NewLine    // relative terms, the previous frame IS the "current" frame)Di2015NewLine    PrevError = error;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // DoneDi2015NewLine    BoardLED.Write(false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3903532Di2015UniqueSeparatortable
3903532Di2015UniqueSeparatorStructLayoutAttribute.Pack
3903532Di2015UniqueSeparatorLayoutKind.Explicit
3903532Di2015UniqueSeparatorFieldOffset
3903746Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
3903746Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable
3903846Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Cancel processing, do not invoke any more handlersDi2015NewLine    public bool Cancel { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CommandDispatcher Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private Dictionary<Type, List<Action<ICommand>>> _commands = new Dictionary<Type, List<Action<ICommand>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Add to dictionary hereDi2015NewLine  public void Subscribe<T>(Action<T> action) where T : ICommandDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      List<Action<ICommand>> subscribers;Di2015NewLine      if (!_commands.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out subscribers))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          subscribers = new List<Action<ICommand>>();Di2015NewLine          _commands.Add(typeof(T), subscribers));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      subscribers.Add(action);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // find command and to foreach to execute the actions      Di2015NewLine  public void Trigger<T>(T command) where T : ICommandDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      List<Action<ICommand>> subscribers;Di2015NewLine      if (!_commands.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out subscribers))Di2015NewLine          throw new InvalidOperationException("There are no subscribers for that command");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach(var subsriber in subscribers)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          subscriber(command);Di2015NewLine          if (command.Cancel)Di2015NewLine              break; //a handler canceled the command to prevent others from processing it.Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AddTextCommand : ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string TextToAdd {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TextHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TextHandler(CommandDispatcher dispatcher)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        disptacher.Subscribe<AddTextCommand>(OnAddText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnAddText(AddTextCommand cmd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //....Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic partial class MyForm : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CommandDispatcher _dispatcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void MyTextBox_Changed(object source, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _dispatcher.Trigger(new AddTextCommand{TextToAdd = MyTextBox.Text}=;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3905516Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T callFoo<T>(int len)Di2015NewLine    where T : new()  //ensure an empty constructor so it can be activatedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   T obj = new T();Di2015NewLine   GetType().GetMethod("foo", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic,Di2015NewLine       null,  new[] { typeof(int), typeof(T).MakeByRefType() }, null)Di2015NewLine       .Invoke(this, new object[] { len, obj });Di2015NewLine   return obj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3905516Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void foo(int len, ref classA obj){}Di2015NewLine    protected void foo(int len, ref classB obj){  }Di2015NewLine    protected void foo(int len, ref classC obj){}Di2015NewLine    static readonly Dictionary<Type, Delegate> functions;Di2015NewLine    delegate void MyDelegate<T>(Test arg0, int len, ref T obj);Di2015NewLine    static Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        functions = new Dictionary<Type, Delegate>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var method in typeof(Test).GetMethods(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (method.Name != "foo") continue;Di2015NewLine            var args = method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine            if (args.Length != 2 || args[0].ParameterType != typeof(int)) continue;Di2015NewLine            var type = args[1].ParameterType.GetElementType();Di2015NewLine            functions[type] = Delegate.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine                typeof(MyDelegate<>).MakeGenericType(type), method);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public T callFoo<T>(int len)Di2015NewLine        where T : new()  //ensure an empty constructor so it can be activatedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T obj = new T();Di2015NewLine        Delegate function;Di2015NewLine        if (!functions.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out function)) throw new NotSupportedException(Di2015NewLine             "foo is not supported for " + typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        ((MyDelegate<T>)function)(this, len, ref obj);Di2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
